column3:
interesting but I know how you feel especially the whole people telling that it in your head 
I don't really have people telling me in my head, more like behind my back

and why is that?
Me too! What do you believe in? I believe in dragons... Just finished watching Game of Thrones. Man, those things are dope

Dang that's though. But I also understand that. I have people some who talks behind my back because of certain things that I believe in 
I think it's because in my head, I think everyone is judging me. I just start to sweat and I get sick in my stomach.
column4:
جالب است اما من می‌دانم چطور احساس می‌کنید، به ویژه وقتی که همه به شما می‌گویند که این تنها در ذهن شماست.

و چرا اینطور است؟

دمت گرم، اما من هم این را می‌فهمم. من افرادی دارم که پشت پشت من صحبت می‌کنند به خاطر باورهای خاصی که دارم.
column5:
من واقعاً افرادی در ذهنم ندارم، بلکه بیشتر پشت پشتم به من می‌گویند.

من هم همینطور! تو چه باوری داری؟ من به اژدهاها باور دارم... همین الان دیدم بازی تاج و تخت. آقا، اون چیزها خیلی باحالن

فکر می‌کنم این به این دلیل است که در ذهنم فکر می‌کنم همه من را قضاوت می‌کنند. من فقط شروع به تعریق می‌کنم و معده‌ام درد می‌کند.
column6:
چطور می‌توانم این احساس را به شکل عمومی درک کنم؟

اگر احساس می‌کنید که چیزی در ذهن ش

خوب، اینطور است چون چند ماه قبل از اینکه من را به اینجا بفرستند، من در یک موسسه موسالمه به عن

به عنوان مثال، اگر من به دلیل محدودیت‌های زمانی یا دیگر عوامل نمی‌توستم برای چند ساعت

column3:
He eats insects, leaves and sun flower seeds. It's easy. They don't need walking and cleanup is simple. Do you have any pets?
What does your turtle eat? Is it hard to take care of a turtle?
Congratulations. Do you come from a big family?
No, not at the moment. I have 3 girls and they are enough trouble! LOL
Wow. cool. How often do you use computers?
No, but I have snorkled.
Often. I use them at work for editing. I head about a way to stream videos or movies from the local library.
No, just 2 siblings. But my wife wanted a lot of kids. So, there you go.
Stream from the library - now, that sounds interesting. My wife and I do some scuba diving and want to begin filming underwater. Ever tried that?
I use a Mac for my work - I'm a music teacher. I find it really helpful. How about you? Are you on the computer a lot?
That's cool too. That's how we began. Seen lots of Turtles! LOL
column4:
او حشرات، برگ‌ها و دانه‌های آفتابگردان می‌خورد. این کار آسان است. آن‌ها نیازی به پیاده‌روی ندارند و تمیزکاری آن‌ها ساده است. آیا حیوان خانگی دارید؟

تبریک میگم. آیا از خانواده‌ای بزرگ می‌آیید؟

واو. باحال. چقدر اغلب از کامپیوتر استفاده می کنید؟

معمولاً. من از آن‌ها در محل کار برای ویرایش استفاده می‌کنم. من درباره یک روش برای پخش ویدیوها یا فیلم‌ها از کتابخانه محلی شنیده‌ام.

جریان از کتابخانه - حالا، این جالب به نظر می‌رسد. همسرم و من کمی غواصی انجام می‌دهیم و می‌خواهیم شروع به فیلم‌برداری زیر آب کنیم. تا به حال امتحان کرده‌اید؟

این هم خوبه. اینجوری شروع کردیم. خیلی لاکپشت دیدیم! ههه
column5:
خرچنگ شما چی میخوره؟ مراقبت از یک خرچنگ سخته؟

نه، در حال حاضر نه. من 3 دختر دارم و آن‌ها کافی مشکل دارند! LOL

نه، اما من شناوری کرده‌ام.

نه، فقط ۲ برادر و خواهر. اما همسرم می‌خواست بچه‌های زیادی داشته باشیم. به همین شکل شد.

من برای کارم از یک مک استفاده می کنم - من یک معلم موسیقی هستم. من این واقعاً مفید می یابم. شما چطور؟ آیا شما زیاد روی کامپیوتر هستید؟

column3:
"Yeah, kids grow up so quickly"
'Can't believe he grew up so quick'

"We will probably just spend most of the time here at home, no big plans really."
'What do you usually do when he visits?'

"You're only as old as you feel is what I say."
'I understand. I think we will do the same. I hope he brings a few of his friends. I am not that old... if you know what I mean :)'

'Not really since I am usually spending my time alone in my studio painting, but I might give it some thought.'
"Yes, that's exactly right! If you don't mind me asking, have you ever considered any of your son's friends? ^_^"

'Well everyone is an adult so who am I to judge, sounds like a good bit of fun to me.'
'You should. I am not really a blond, but I would say cute and the kids dig me. :) And you know, sometimes I let them play with me'

'Just about to clean up my paints and and put them away for the day.'
'What are you up to now, girl?'
column4:
بله، برای بچه‌ها خیلی زود بزرگ می‌شوند.

ممکن است بیشتر وقت خود را اینجا در خانه بگذرانیم، واقعا بقرار بزرگی ندارد.

تنها به اندازه احساس می‌کنی که پیر هستی.

واقعاً نه، زیرا معمولاً وقت خود را تنها در استودیوی خود برای نقاشی صرف می‌کنم، اما ممکن است کمی به آن فکر کنم.

همه بزرگسال هستند، پس من چه حقی دارم که قضاوت کنم، به نظر من خیلی جالب به نظر می‌رسد.

تقریباً آماده‌ام تا رنگ‌هایم را تمیز کنم و برای امروز آن‌ها را بگذارم.
column5:
نمی‌توانم باور کنم که او به این سرعت بزرگ شد.

وقتی او می‌آید، شما معمولا چه کارهایی انجام می‌دهید؟

من متوجه شدم. فکر می‌کنم ما همین کار را انجام خواهیم داد. امیدوارم او چند تای از دوستانش هم بیاورد. من اونقدر هم پیر نیستم... اگر متوجه منظورم شدید :)

بله، دقیقا درست است! اگر از من بپرسید، آیا تا به حال به یکی از دوستان پسرتان فکر کرده‌اید؟ ^_^

شما باید. من واقعاً بلوند نیستم، اما می‌گویم زیبا هستم و بچه‌ها عاشقم هستند. :) و می‌دانید، گاهی اوقات به آن‌ها اجازه می‌دهم با من بازی کنند.

دختر، الان چه کاری میکنی؟

جمله "" نسبت به محتوای مفه

column3:
Canning is great for storing food. Sometimes I can food before my marathons to calm my anxiety.
Wow, you've done a marathon?  I run a bit, but never tried anything long

Yeah it's a great way to keep your heart healthy! I wish the marathons were in the evening though. Are you a morning or night person?
I'm totally a morning person.  I wake naturally around 6 a.m. And you?

I wake up at 6 a.m.when I have work, sometimes I'll get up at 5 a.m. though for a morning run.
So, how long and how far is your morning run?  And when you prepare for a marathon?

Generally I'll run about 3 miles, but when a marathon is coming up I'll build my way up to 5 or 7 miles every morning.
That's impressive.  I would like to try but I just don't have the stamina! Do you ever run with a dog?

I don't have a dog, I just don't have the time to dedicate to a pet! Do you have any pets?
No pets, just a crowd of feral cats from the neighborhood that roam through the yard. Fun to watch.

Oh that sounds funny, I like seeing cats roaming about the neighborhood. Cats are quiet creatures that really know how to take it easy!
We've had to step in a few times when one was injured, or a mama cat died. But they are timid creatures.
column4:
کنسرو کردن عالی برای نگهداری غذا است. گاهی اوقات من غذاها را قبل از ماراتن‌هایم کنسرو می‌کنم تا اضطرابم را کاهش دهم.

بله، این یک راه عالی برای حفظ سلامتی قلب است! اما کاش مسابقات ماراتن شب برگزار می‌شدند. آیا شما صبح‌زود یا شب‌ها فعال هستید؟

من ساعت ۶ صبح بیدار می‌شوم وقتی کار دارم، گاهی اوقات برای دویدن صبحگاهی ساعت ۵ صبح بیدار می‌شوم.

به طور کلی من حدود 3 مایل می دویدم، اما وقتی ماراتنی نزدیک است، هر صبح به تدریج به 5 یا 7 مایل افزایش می یابم.

من سگی ندارم، فقط وقت کافی برای اختصاص به یک حیوان خانگی ندارم! آیا شما حیوان خانگی دارید؟

اوه، این خنده‌دار به نظر می‌رسد، من دوست دارم گربه‌ها را در محله دید. گربه‌ها موجوداتی ساکت هستند که واقعا می‌دانند چطور آرام بگیرند!
column5:
وای، تو ماراتن دویدی؟ من کمی دویدم، ولی هیچ وقت چیزی بلندتر امتحان نکردم.

من کاملاً یک شخص صبحگاهی هستم. من به طور طبیعی حدود ساعت ۶ صبح بیدار می‌شوم. شما چطور؟

پس، چقدر طول میکشه و چقدر دور می‌دوی صبحانه؟ و وقتی برای ماراتن آماده می‌شوی؟

این تحسین برانگیز است. دوست دارم امتحان کنم اما فقط استقامت ندارم! آیا تو همیشه با سگ دویده‌ای؟

هیچ حیوان خانگی نداریم، فقط یک گروه از گربه‌های وحشی از محله که در حیاط پرسه می‌زنند. تماشای آن‌ها خیلی جالب است.

ما چند بار مجبور شدیم دخالت کنیم وقتی یکی از آن‌ها زخمی شد یا یک مادر گربه فوت کرد. اما آن‌ها موجودات خجالتی هستند.

بهترین چیزی که م

من یک هویت انسانی نیستم و به طور مستقیم احساس خستگی یا نیاز به استراحت نمی‌کنم، اما م

چند تا سری کردن و چند تا دویدن چه قدر زمان می‌بره؟

وقتی به دنبال یک برنامه تمر

این یک ماه از این تمرینات باعث شده که نمی توانم نه تناسب بدنی، نه جسمانی، نه روحی را

من یک هوش مصنوعی هستم و حیوان خانگی ندارم. اما من می‌توانم به شما کمک کنم تا بهترین گ

اما این گربه‌ها به نظر می‌رسد که این چیزی نیست که این اتفاق رخ دهد. من گاهی اوقات

column3:
How would I start rock climbing?
I would suggest a fitness place with a rock wall. Try that out in a safe environment

I will do that. I will take my mom with me since she is my best friend.
It's good to have a spotter! Also, get in overall good shape with an emphasis on balance

Where should be go after the fitnes place? Would the ocean be a good spot?
Ha ha - not for rock climbing. Maybe you are thinking of diving?

I was thinking about diving. I would love to see some real life mermaids.
You may need to limit yourself to Disneyland for mermaids. They're not actually real.

Thats not true. My mother told me they really exist.
I see. I wonder where she has seen them?

She saw them when she was younger. I will believe my best friend since I know my mother well.
Far be it to argue with anyone's mother! Do you have siblings?
column4:
چطور می‌توانم شروع به صعود کوه کنم؟

من این کار را انجام خواهم داد. من مادرم را با خود خواهم برد چون او بهترین دوست من است.

بعد از مکان فیتنس باید کجا برویم؟ آیا اقیانوس مکان خوبی است؟

من در حال فکر کردن به غواصی بودم. دوست داشتم حقیقتاً مردگان دریایی را ببینم.

این درست نیست. مادرم به من گفت که آنها واقعا وجود دارند.

او آن‌ها را دید وقتی که جوان‌تر بود. من بهترین دوستم را باور خواهم کرد چون مادرم را خوب می‌شناسم.
column5:
من پیشنهاد می‌کنم یک مکان تناسب اندام با دیوار سنگی را امتحان کنید. این را در یک محیط ایمن امتحان کنید.

خوبه یک نگهبان داشته باشی! همچنین، به طور کلی ورزش کنید و بر تعادل تاکید کنید.

هه هه - نه برای صعود سنگی نیست. شاید شما در حال فکر کردن به غواصی هستید؟

شما ممکن است نیاز داشته باشید که خودتان را به دیزنی‌لند برای پری‌دختران محدود کنید. آن‌ها در واقع واقعی نیستند.

من می‌بینم. من تعجب می‌کنم که او آنها را کجا دیده است؟

دور به جدال با مادر کسی باشد! آیا شما خواهر یا برادر دارید؟

column3:
I am excited. I just hope they can get through today then the rest of the week will be easy.
I'm sure you'll do great. In second grade, that's where the kiddos will begin learning mathematics and science and social studies among other subjects

 I really don't know anyone around, but most of this neighborhood is young. What do you do for work?
I work for a Mexican cartel that kidnaps 1st graders and sells them into slavery... ;) Just kidding

haaa. well no one works if they don't have to. I took a year off traveling last year.
I'm only kidding lol. I am a veterinarian. I love dogs and cats! Well and children too :)

cool. the only dogs and cats I see are dead, embalmed and on display. Guess where I work?
The morgue! ROFL

haaa, a museum.
That was my second guess :) but it was too late, I pressed the Send button

It's amazing. but it's the only people I know here. recommend any restaurants?
McDonald's? :) Just kidding... Well I don't even know where you live, but I'd say SoHo Sushi is my fave
column4:
من هیجان زده هستم. فقط امیدوارم که بتوانند امروز را پشت سر بگذارند و بقیه هفته آسان خواهد بود.

من واقعاً هیچ کسی رو اطراف نمی‌شناسم، اما بیشتر افراد این محله جوان هستند. شما چه کاری انجام می‌دهید؟

ها. خب هیچکس کار نمی‌کند اگر مجبور نباشد. سال گذشته یک سال مرخصی گرفتم و سفر کردم.

خوب. تنها سگ‌ها و گربه‌هایی که می‌بینم، مرده، محنط و در نمایشگاه هستند. حدس بزنید کجا کار می‌کنم؟

هااا، یک موزه.

این شگفت‌انگیز است. اما این تنها افرادی هستند که اینجا می‌شناسم. آیا هر رستورانی را پیشنهاد می‌دهید؟

من برای یک کارتل مکزیکی که دانش‌آموزان کلاس اول را ربوده و آن‌ها را به برده‌داری می‌فروشد کار می‌کنم... ;) فقط شوخی کردم

من فقط شوخی می‌کنم هاها. من دامپزشک هستم. من عاشق سگ‌ها و گربه‌ها هستم! و البته کودکان هم :)

مرگزاری! خنده‌های بی‌پایان

درباره این که

column3:
"I am surprised how many reality tv shows are on air, what's your favorite type"
"i like ones that aren't too scripted. there's one from japan called terrace house that is nice"

"I like the outdoors type, the ones based in Alaska are interesting"
"i have seen cop shows based in alaska, there's a lot of socioeconomic issues up there"

"I think like many reality shows they exaggerate how bad things are for ratings"
"yeah, for sure. they make their own narrative to make a more interesting watching experience"

"Some of the home improvement reality shows are interesting but they make their job look easier than it is"
"it looks easy when they can condense months of work into 30 minute - 1 hour episodes"

"that's true, I wish they would show more of the work it takes to get a project started and completed"
"i do understand that it makes for better watching to have a really drastic before and after shot without all the gritty work details"
column4:
من حیرت زده هستم که چقدر برنامه‌های تلویزیون واقعیت در حال پخش هستند، نوع مورد علاقه‌ات چیه؟

من نوع فضای باز را دوست دارم، آن‌هایی که در آلاسکا مستقر هستند جالب هستند.

فکر می‌کنم مانند بسیاری از برنامه‌های واقعیت، آن‌ها برای امتیازات، موارد بد را بیش‌از حد بزرگ‌نمایی می‌کنند.

برخی از برنامه‌های واقعیت بهبود خانه جالب هستند اما آن‌ها کار خود را آسان‌تر از آنچه است نشان می‌دهند.

این درست است، آرزو دارم که بیشتر از کاری که برای شروع و اتمام یک پروژه لازم است نشان دهند.

من از آن‌ها که خیلی از قبل نوشته نشده‌اند خوشم می‌آید. یکی از ژاپن به نام خانه تراس وجود دارد که خوب است.

من سریال‌های پلیس مرتبط با آلاسکا را دیده‌ام، در آنجا مشکلات اجتماعی و اقتصادی زیادی وجود دارد.

بله، قطعا. آنها داستان خود را می‌سازند تا تجربه تماشای جذاب‌تری را فراهم کنند.

وقتی که آن‌ها می‌توانند ماه‌ها کار را در قسمت‌های ۳۰ دقیقه تا ۱ ساعتی فشرده کنند، به نظر آسان می‌آید.

من می‌فهمم که برای تماشای بهتر، داشتن یک تصویر قبل و بعد واقعاً شگفت‌انگیز بدون جزئیات کار زحمت‌آور بهتر است.

Really? That has been around for awhile then.
Yeah isn't that crazy. I love geysers. Have you ever seen one in person?

One time I was in a large group of people but couldn't get a very good look because of all the tall people in front of me.
Oh no! I am pretty tall so I don't have that problem. Except everyone looks at me funny in public.

But, you can always grab things off the top shelf. That is a challenge for me!
That's true. It has lots of advantages! Do you like hiking?

I do right now especially. The trees are all so pretty. I love the red leaves.
I love it when the leaves turn colors.

I would love to go to New England to see the leaves in the fall sometime. I hear it is very pretty.
I went there once about 4 years ago in the fall. It's so beautiful!

Did you hike there?
I did yes! It was spectacular.

'My coworker decided to pay for the lunch and I will repay once back at the office.'
'That was nice of him!'

'Next time I will make sure not to forget my wallet again.'
"I bet it was a pretty embarassing situation! I've forgotten my wallet before."

'Yes it was!, but it was a lesson learned  to not forget again.'
'Definitely. Where did you go to lunch?'

'Went to a nice sushi spot around down town.'
'I love sushi! We should go sometime.'

'That would be a good idea to meet up and enjoy some lovely sushi.'
'I am free on Saturday for dinner. I think there is a place downtown that has an all-you-can eat sushi option. Interested?'

'You talked me into it and I can not wait!'
"Let's do it. Meet at your place around 7?"

I understand.  I guess I tend to socialize with my cat the most.  He is almost like family.

i think pets can be family for sure. just hanging out with them and petting them can be really calming
Most definitely, except when he knocks stuff off of tables.  Do you have any pets?

i used to have a cat that was really bad about that, couldn't have anything on tables at all. but now i have a dog and a couple cats
How does your dog get along with the cats?

they mostly just ignore each other. the cats are actually bigger than him so they never really seem worried about his presence
What kind of dog is it?

a mix but mostly chihuahua, so he is tiny
I heard Chihuhuas are evil.  Any truth to that?
column4:
گاهی اوقات سخت‌تر از روزهای دیگر است. اما خوب است که با مادرتان خوب رفتار می‌کنید.

این خوب بود، این در زندگی بزرگسالی من اتفاق افتاد، پس همه ما کار داشتیم و مشغول بودیم و شاید به اندازه کافی اجتماعی نبودیم که می‌توانستیم باشیم.

من فکر می‌کنم حیوانات خانگی می‌توانند قطعاً جزو خانواده باشند. فقط با آن‌ها وقت گذرانی کردن و لمس کردن آن‌ها می‌تواند واقعاً آرامش بخش باشد.

آن‌ها اکثراً فقط یکدیگر را نادیده می‌گیرند. گربه‌ها در واقع از او بزرگتر هستند، بنابراین هرگز واقعاً نگران حضور او نمی‌شوند.

یک مخلوط اما اصلیتاً چیواوا، بنابراین او خیلی کوچک است

column3:
Haha I wish! My ex texted me the other day. She apparently still loves me.
Huh, but why did you break up in the first place?

We wanted different things in the future. She wanted kids and I didn't. Stuff like that.
Do you think either of you have changed your minds on that stuff?

I have. I think I want kids now.
Maybe you guys could try hanging out again before jumping back into dating. Did you stay friends after breaking up?

Somewhat. We have both dated a couple other people, but we see each other at parties and stuff. Hanging out before dating is a good idea.
That could be nice, it'd be a good chance to talk and get caught up.

Maybe I'll ask her to go on a walk with me at a park this weekend.
I think it'd be fine if you guys tried angling towards dating again then, if you are also into it. Just don't feel pressured by her feelings!

Definitely. And see if we are on the same page, possibly, for the future. No need to rush into things.
Definitely. Going from being exes to dating and definitely having kids would be way too fast.

Indeed. Well, talk to you later!
Yep, see ya!

تا حدی. هر دو ما با چند نفر دیگر قرار داده‌ایم، اما در مهمانی‌ها و موارد دیگر با یکدیگر ملاقات می‌کنیم. وقتی قبل از قرار دادن با یکدیگر وقت می‌گذاریم، ایده خوبی است.

شاید این هفته به او بگویم که با من برای پیاده روی به پارک برود.

بله. خب، بوقت دیگر باهات حرف میزنم!

'Do you have a favorite game?' 
'Yes I do and that is playing Sudoka.'

'Sudoka? Is that similar to sudoku?' 
'This one is the ultimate version of it, it is worth checking out'

"I'll definitely check it out! Where do you play?" 
'I just at home when I have the chance.'

'Nice! Do you have a book of sudoka, or do you play on a computer?' 
'I do have several books that I like to play through.'

'Nice! I am heading to the mall in Chicago tomorrow. I will have to pick up a book!' 
'That sounds nice, I have never been to Chicago, but pics of the place seems so nice.'

'It is a little too crowded for my tastes, but it is a decent place to live.' 
"I'm sure it is. Maybe I'll visit too"

That sounds like fun! What are you planning to do at the lake.

Fish, hang out, play some games, swim, and relax
I like going out to the lake to watch the water and other folks enjoying themselves.

It is going to be a blast! I have to remember to bring my fishing pole, though. I forgot it the last time.
Do you catch any fish out at the lake?

Lots of bass and northern. Loads of fun. Do you fish?
No! I have never fished, but would love to someday.

My family owns the lake, so we could go up whenever you're free

column3:
"Yes! Time especially goes by fast when I'm working at my job. I'm constantly busy."
"So true! We just had a baby, and work just flies by! I usually can't wait to get back home."

"I understand that. I have a 5 year old so I'm anxious to get back home and enjoy time with him."
"Do you just have the one kid? This is my first."

"Yes, I just have one kid. I'm hoping to start trying for another within the next year or two."
"My wife want to start trying now. Seems like so much is happening quickly."

"Oh that's exciting! How many more do you all want? I want just 1 more. I'd love to have a girl this time."
"We want to have at least 6 kids. We are from Italy, and we love having big families!"

"Oh, that is awesome! Do you and your wife come from a big family?"
"My wife does, I am an only child. My mom is in the medical field and did not really have time for kids."

"I'm an only child as well. I wish that I had siblings growing up but it did allow me special moments with my parents."
"I do not see my mom much, but I have a great relationship with my dad."
column4:

من متوجه هستم. پسر پنج ساله دارم، بنابراین مشتاقم که به خانه برگردم و وقت خوشی با او داشته باشم.

'I love to visit thrift stores. ' 
'awesome i like thrift stores too you can find some great items there .'

'Same here. I tend to buy in bulk.' 
'oh wow do you like to visit thrift shops ?'

'Definitely! I once found a signed jacob sartorius record.' 
'That is amazing. I would love to have something like that in my collection. Any idea what the value is for it?'

'Probably at least a couple hundred. ' 
'man , you have got an all around good deal !'

'I know! Have you ever found any worth a lot of money at a thrift store?' 
'I have found some furniture for my friend's apartment. It was a great deal to come across. '

'Nice! Vintage furniture is the best!' 
'The old ones are always better aren't they??'

i am alone but i'm not lonely.i have a dog who's great company.
What kind of dog do you have?
It's an attack chihuahua.It'll attack anything- shoes,socks,laundry, anything that fight back.LOL
I am not a fan of chihuahuas. I prefer labs or german shepherds.
I meant to say anything that won't fight back.big dogs are cool but they need a lot of exercise and they eat a lot.
Very true. I run a lot, so I think I could handle a big dog.
yeah.take him running with you.how much do you run and how far usually?
Every day. Anywhere from 3 miles to 20 miles. And the occassional marathon
i very much respect that.i've got bad knees.i can't run  but i walk 30-60  minutes every day
Walking is good exercise. I get shin splints often, so running hurts. I walk often too.
shin splints .oh that's bad.i used to get them occasionally years ago when i ran.
Yeah, they are rough. Usually I try to just run through them. Some days they are so bad I can barely walk.

column3:
"I'm a thrill seaker. Do you like extreme sports?"
"I usually don't. But this one was very impressive."

"What do you like most about it?"
"I really like just being able to escape to a different world."

"Yeah, like everything fades away. Do you ever watch the olympics?"
"I usually don't, but I do enjoy watching it during the summer Olympics!"

"What is your favorite olympic sport?"
"I like swimming. What's yours?"

"Summer sport would be skateboarding, and winter would be ice cross."
"That's cool. What got you into watching sports?"

"Acess to the tv, lol. Just kidding. I love to participate so watching was a way to learn more about the sports I like. What about you."
"Mostly just lack of anything else to do around here, and all my friends were into sports at the time"

column3:
Yes early detection improves the odds to beating it. The symptoms shown by my mom was a chronic fever for more than 10 days
I am sorry to hear that. What type of cancer did/does she have/had? But very luckily, she was cured and a great survivor from this cancer.
That is great to hear. What type of cancer did she have? She had a skin cancer.
What kind of treatment did she receive for the skin cancer? We gave her a Excisional surgery for her treatment.
Interesting. How long ago did she have the surgery? For more than six months.
She hasn't had any re-occurrence of the cancer? Not yet any re-occurrence of the cancer cells, though I'm single and not looking, I'm taking care of her.

Wow! I would love to have the space to adopt some kids of my own.
Do you have kids of your own?
I don't we are waiting to pay off the house before we have kids. What about you?
We have two boys.
Are they still children or are they grown?
They are my wife's children from her previous marriage. The eldest is disabled, and my wife cares for him. The younger is in high school.
I can't imagine how hard it would be to take care of a disabled child. Do you help out a lot?
It is hard. I do what I can, but I am out of town on work a lot. The child attends a day program and has visiting nurses.
Wow, that is a lot of care. What do you do for a living that takes you out of town so much?
I'm out on the oil rigs. Where do you work?

'My phone died and I could not find the charger for my phone so I wanted to get a newspaper.'
'So you normally view the newspaper on your phone?'

'I usually do it is just the most convenient place for me to get caught up with the news.'
'I prefer to read a newspaper. I guess I am old school like that. '

'Why do you like getting news from a newspaper more?'
'I find it easier to read words printed in ink. Plus I can clean windows with the newspaper when I am done reading it!'

'Yeah sometimes my eyes start to hurt after looking at a screen too long.'
'Yeah. Do you ever use the blue light filter feature on your devices? '

'No what is that?'
'It filters out blue light from your electronic devices. This keeps your eyes from straining while viewing your device. '

'I will definitely look into that because I work a lot on my computer.'
'I know Galaxy phones have the feature built in and it works great!'

"you asked me what do i do for life.i told you what i'd like to do.what do you do or wish you were doing?"

"I hate talking to you. Ima freakin' chef. What do you do? (not wish to do)"
"you're a chef.i'm a waiter."

"that wasn't that hard was it? Now I like you more :)"
'you have the better ,more respected job.everyone loves the chef.everyone hates the waiter, judging by the tips i get'

No. I use caffeine so much it just makes me feel normal.

Maybe when I was younger. I have been a chronic cappuccino consumer for decades now.

Are cappuccinos expensive?
Not really. They average about $4.00 per large serving.

I love Starbucks and not just because I work there!

Those are pretty good! You should get one with a triple shot!

column3:
"We all have a test tomorrow and they hadn't studied enough."
"That's such a bummer! They could have studied at your birthday dinner..."

"Yes, we all could have studied together, that would have been more fun than them canceling."
"wish i could go . . . i've a test tomorrow to study for too..."

"That's nice of you to say. :)"
"Maybe we could get together and celebrate. I don't have a boyfriend so I'm always available ;-)"

"That would be fun. Not sure where I want to go tho."
'Well, it being your birthday and autumn, how about I treat you to a pumpkin spice latte at the local cafe while we study?'

'Sounds great! I need to go back to the dorm and get my books tho.'
"My favorite season is spring so I wear spring wardrobe much too late in the year so I'm underdressed and need to go to my dorm to get a jacket."

"Ok well let's head that way first. I love this weather!"
'I do love the autumn colors and comfy sweaters, and of course pumpkin spice lattes! Should we meet there in say, 30 minutes?'

I read that it was made with fresh hand-cut pasta and then slathered with butter and cheese. So it sounds exactly like what we make today!
Do you know what kind of cheese they used? Like usually we use cheddar now.

I don't, but whatever it was I bet it was delicious. Imagine how it was just from the same cow
Back then they could of made it with goat milk, but whatever animal they milked it was definitely fresh? And the pasta...I love fresh pasta.

Yeah! And pasta dates back to the 4th century B.C.!
Have you ever made fresh macaroni and cheese?

I haven't, but maybe I'll give it a try!
It's much better then the boxed stuff...it's not too hard either. How long does it take?

yeah. anything interesting? it was a lot of school but i like it . hope my daughter does follows .

yeah. there's a lot of good advice in her actual teachings. ive learnt to be way more patient I work 60 hours a week so it's hard to find time to do the montessori lifestyle

whoa. it does take a lot. well me and my wife are a team . our daughter needs us. i hope you can find someone to help out We definitely have a lazy lifestyle at home since I just like to relax after work. Sometimes I think i should get out and exercise more.

well i do make time to go outdoors with my kids. so that's where i get in some physical activity I used to love the outdoors before I became a CEO and now the most outdoors I get is walking from my corvette to the office building.

its really hard to keep up a schedule. but hey i tend to feel better when I eat better. do you watch your diet? I try to eat at higher quality restaurants but being on the road for business doesn't always allow that. I stay at hotels and order out a lot.

when do you go on the road again I go on the road when I have to check on other franchises for my company.
column4:
بله. چیز جالبی بود؟ زیاد مدرسه بود اما من دوست داشتم. امیدوارم دخترم هم این راه را پیش بگیرد.

وای. واقعا زیاد زمان می‌بره. خب من و همسرم یک تیمیم. دخترمون به ما نیاز داره. امیدوارم بتونید کسی پیدا کنید که کمک کنه. ما حتما یک سبک زندگی تنبل در خانه داریم چون من فقط دوست دارم بعد از کار استراحت کنم. گاهی فکر می‌کنم باید بیرون برم و بیشتر ورزش کنم.

برنامه ریزی را حفظ کردن واقعا سخت است. اما خب، من معمولا احساس بهتری می‌کنم وقتی بهتر غذا می‌خورم. آیا شما رژیم غذایی خود را رعایت می‌کنید؟ من سعی می‌کنم در رستوران‌های با کیفیت بالاتر غذا بخورم اما برای کارهای تجاری اغلب این امکان را ندارم. من در هتل‌ها اقامت می‌کنم و بسیار غذا سفارش می‌دهم.

بله. در تدریس واقعی او، خیلی نکات خوبی وجود دارد. من یاد گرفته‌ام که بسیار بیشتر صبور باشم. من هفتاد ساعت در هفته کار می‌کنم، بنابراین سخت است زمان برای زندگی مونتسوری را پیدا کنم.

خب من وقت می‌گذارم که با بچه‌هایم بیرون بروم. پس از آنجا که من فعالیت‌های ورزشی انجام می‌دهم. قبل از اینکه مدیرعامل شوم، عاشق بیرون بودم و اکنون بیشترین وقتی که بیرون می‌گذرم، پیاده‌روی از کوروت به ساختمان دفتر است.

زمانی که دوباره روی جاده می‌روی؟ من زمانی روی جاده می‌روم که باید وضعیت شعب دیگر برای شرکتم بررسی کنم.

"Jay-Z"
"Tbh I think his wife is a better rapper than he is ;)"
"lol"
"I don't consider her a rapper, she's an okay rapper for a singer."
"You don't think so?"
"Because she is a singer. She doesn't make rap songs."
"Why isn't she a rapper?"
"Ok, so give me an example of why you think she is a better rapper than Jay-Z..."
"But rap songs were on her last couple of albums."
"Well, we both know who wrote it anyway."
"Her flow and delivery are much better."
"If you actually look at the credits on her album you will clearly see his name."
"That's sexist."
"That's all important. He's okay. Who else do you like?"

column3:
"I'm really sorry to hear that. Losing two family members in such a short timespan is really heartbreaking. "
"its really heart breaking. i'm so glad to have made good memories. it would be tragic if i had regrets"

"I completely agree. It makes you realize how important it is to spend time with people while they are here."
"Absolutely, it's a chapter of your life and as long as you have those memories they live on through those memories."

"That is a really good way of looking at it. And you can share those memories with new people in your life and breathe life into them."
"You are so right. It can make all the difference."

"Do you have other family members to help you after your loss?"
"yeah we have a large close knit family. how bout you?"

"We keep in touch, but all my immediate family lives rather far. So it is just me and my dogs at home."
"same here . i just know a lot of people that actually is going through it ."

"It is really hard to watch people go through it, whether they decide to get treatment or just accept it."
"so how do you feel about cancer..."

متاسفم که این را شنیدم. از دست دادن دو عضو خانواده در یک بازه زمانی کوتاه واقعاً دلخراش است.

من کاملاً موافقم. این باعث می‌شود که متوجه شوید چقدر اهمیت دارد که زمان خود را با افرادی که در کنارتان هستند بگذرانید.

این روش بسیار خوبی برای نگاه کردن به زندگی است. و شما می توانید این خاطرات را با افراد جدید در زندگی خود به اشتراک بگذارید و آنها را زنده کنید.

آیا اعضای خانواده دیگری دارید که پس از از دست دادنتان به شما کمک کنند؟

ما در تماس هستیم، اما تمام خانواده‌ی نزدیک من خیلی دور زندگی می‌کنند. بنابراین فقط من و سگ‌هایم در خانه هستیم.

واقعاً سخت است که مردم را ببینیم که از آن عبور می کنند، برایشان تصمیم به درمان گرفتن یا فقط قبول آن می کنند.
column5:
این واقعاً دل شکسته کننده است. خیلی خوشحالم که خاطرات خوبی دارم. اگر پشیمانی داشتم، این واقعاً تراژیک بود.

قطعاً، این یک فصل از زندگی شماست و تا زمانی که این خاطرات را دارید، زنده می‌مانند از طریق این خاطرات.

شما کاملا درست می‌فرمایید. این می‌تواند تمام تفاوت را ایجاد کند.

بله، ما یک خانواده بزرگ و مترابط داریم. شما چطور؟

همینجا. من فقط زیادی افرادی را می‌شناسم که واقعاً این موضوع را تجربه می‌کنند.

پس چطور احساس می‌کنید در مورد سرطان...

"Not that I wanted to take... maybe I'll just take the semester off..."
"No, that may throw you off by a whole semester!  I would be really mad if I were you!"

"I have a secret. Being born in Baton Rouge, I've always wanted to be a street performer in New Orleans!"
"That sounds like so much fun. How long have you been performing?"

"I never have but I've had an idea to be a pirate performer. That would be appropriate in New Orleans since it's off the coast. "
"I love New Orleans. I bet you'd fit right in!"

'I practice my act with my parrot named Parrot. I'm Polly Pirate so she asks me if "Polly want a cracker?" It's a comedy act.'
"Sounds like you have some real talent there.  Keep up the good work.  I bet you'll be famous one day!"

"I guess all my classes that I wanted to take being full is a true sign! Maybe I'll even take this to America's Got Talent one day! "
"You're right, perhaps it's divine intervention!"

'Is there any other sort of intervention in life that puts you on the right track in life?!'
'Not without a lot of help!'

خیلی عصبانی، در واقع. اما از آن زمان که دوره سخنرانی من در دانشگاه بود، مشکل بزرگی نداشتم. خوشبختانه برای من قبول شدم.

من متوجهم. حتی اگر اجباری بود، خوشحالم که آن را گرفتم زیرا به نظر می‌رسد نیاز داشتم که به دلیل داشتن تجربه در دوره انتخابات سیاسی در سال ۲۰۰۴.

آره، این همون دلیلی بود که من به دانشگاه برای سخت‌افزار کامپیوتر رفتم، در صورتی که مسئله سیاسی شکست خورد. من اکنون کامپیوترهای خودم را ساخته و فروشگاه خودم را اداره می‌کنم.

column3:
"It's amazing how a little kindness from strangers can go such a long way."
"He thought I was cute and old fashioned since I wore a locket. I still love to line dry my clothes! Nothing better, I say!"
"I agree with you! The way linens smell after being air dried is way better than any dryer sheet"
"A word of advice, always hang your clothes higher than your goats can reach! I learned that early on living on a homestead! Explains the missing socks!"
"Oh wow yeah! I never thought about that. I don't raise animals but my neighbor does. I do like to hunt deer from time to time."
"We've had so many animals but their all for slaughter or use on the farm, chickens for eggs, goats for milk, ya know.... we hunt a lot as well."
"That's great. I love animals, but I also love the thrill of the hunt. I use a bow to make it more interesting."
"Wow! A bow! You're a true hunter! Ya know, all these animals I've owned but I've never had a true indoor pet?"
"Really? Man, pets are great too. I am lost without my dog."
"I'll one day own a ferret. I've been selling our extra eggs at the market to save up for one!"
"Keep at it! Ferrets are cute little things. Where would you put it?"
"I'd cage it at night but take it with me during the day. Ferrets are canines so you can train them like dogs."

این عجیب است که یک کمک کوچک از غریبه ها می تواند مسیر طولانی را طی کند.

من با شما موافقم! بوی پارچه ها پس از خشک شدن به صورت هوایی بهتر از هر برگ خشک کننده ای است.

"اوه واقعاً! من هرگز به این فکر نکرده بودم. من حیوانات نمی‌پرورانم اما همسایه‌ام انجام می‌دهد. من از زمان به زمان دوست دارم گوزن شکار کنم."

این عالیه. من عاشق حیوانات هستم، اما همچنین از هیجان شکار لذت می‌برم. من از کمان استفاده می‌کنم تا شکار جذاب‌تر شود.

واقعا؟ آقا، حیوانات خانگی هم عالی هستند. بدون سگم گم شدم.

به این کار ادامه بده! فرت‌ها موجودات کوچک و جذابی هستند. اون رو کجا قرار می‌دی؟
column5:
او فکر کرد که من جذاب و قدیمی هستم چون یک قلاده می‌پوشیدم. هنوز هم دوست دارم لباس‌هایم را خشک کنم! هیچ چیز بهتری نیست، من می‌گویم!

یک نکته، همیشه لباس‌هایتان را بالاتر از اینکه بزهایتان بتوانند برسند آویزان کنید! من این را زودی یاد گرفتم زندگی در یک مزرعه! این موضوع گم شدن جوراب‌ها را توضیح می‌دهد!

ما تعداد زیادی حیوان داشتیم اما همه آن‌ها برای کشتار یا استفاده در مزرعه بودند، مرغان برای تخم مرغ، بزها برای شیر، میدونی... همچنین زیاد شکار می‌کنیم.

"وای! یک کمان! تو یک شکارچی واقعی هستی! میدونی، تمام این حیواناتی که داشتم ولی هیچ وقت یک حیوان خانگی واقعی نداشتم؟"

یک روز یک فرت خواهم داشت. من تخم ماهیان اضافی ما را در بازار می‌فروشم تا برای یکی از آنها پس‌انداز کنم!

من شب‌ها آن را در قفس نگه می‌دارم اما روزها با خودم می‌برم. فرت‌ها جزء گونه‌های سگی هستند، پس می‌توانید آن‌ها را مثل سگ‌ها آموزش دهید.

i work as a personal trainer , 5 days a week so i had enough strength to pull myself out of the window before the engine exploded.
Wow! That is amazing! You are so lucky. I am not that strong. It must have been scary.

I live n Las Vegas, Nevada so I was bound to encounter a drunk driver one day. I thank God for saving my life that night.
Yes, God is good! I have never been to Vegas. How long have you lived there?

My whole life. Born and raised! I'm thankful I found Jesus before I found out about the sins of Sin City.
Ha! So true! I am from Tennessee, the Bible Belt. We sure know Jesus!

I love tennessee! I have property in the small town of 5000, Ashland City that I visit often. Gets me away from the city.
That is awesome! Where is Ashland City?

About 40 minutes west of Nashville. They have a wildlife refuge area which is where my property is. It's like being in a backwards zoo!
Is that by the Elephant sanctuary?

I haven't heard of an Elephant sanctuary around there but if so I would love to visit! They are a favorite animal!
Yes, there is one by Nashville. I believe it is only 1 of 2 in the United States. That is so neat that you live by a wildlife refuge

I'm seriously going to check this out now, thank you so much!!!
Yes, you need to check it out. I follow them online. It was nice talking to you.

Thats terrible have you ever witnessed this personally

I am so sorry to hear that. Why do you hate your job?

Yes, that is usually how it works. Are there any other hotels hiring for a day shift near you?

Hadn't caught any yet. Plus they are hard to cook on a little boat. Do you eat raw fish?

Indeed, speaking of dark, what type of chocolate do you prefer most? I prefer vegan 100 percent cocoa.
I like Almond milk chocolate.  I'm glad chocolate has health benefits as well.

Me too! It contains so many antibiotics, no wonder it was used in medicine many years ago, and today as well.
Chocolate is not just good for the body, but for the soul as well.

no worries; I knew what you meant.

'Yes they absolutely love it!! They watch it on their tablets in the car!' 
'A boy and a girl. Thomas and Abigale.' 
"Oh absolutely! It's amazing." 
'That is so neat. Are they at the age that they like the Australian Band Hi-5? My kids love to binge watch their show!'
'Oh I bet they do! Are they boys or girls?! What are there names?' 
'They are most of the time; Thomas always seems to get into trouble when he comes with me to feed the horses.'
"oh that's adorable. Are they well behaved?" 
"Nope; can't blame them at all. Especially since my horses are very patient and good with kids."
'Horses are exciting though, can you blame them?! Mine are just the same.'

"Thanks, I'm going to the gym where I used to do yoga a few times a week. I turned it into a living by recording my yoga and teaching."
'Sounds awesome! We have a fitness center locally that offers tanning beds and massages.  i was thinking of joining just for that.'

'That sounds great, I would love too. Also, talking to you has made me less nervous. Thanks.'
'definitely ! it was nice chatting with you too !'

"Thanks, I'm almost getting ready to go now. I'm looking forward to that meeting you offered!"
'Yes I am looking forward to the meeting too! What are you going to wear to your date?!'

"Just casual pants and a shirt, I don't want to feel too awkward too soon."
'Yes good idea!'

column3:
"I really like listening to Imagine Dragons while I work in the garden. It's my favorite thing to do."
"I will try and see them on tour."

"They are awesome! I took my grandkids to a live concert of theirs. They laughed when they saw their old Pops getting down to their generation's music."
"haaa, nice. how did you first hear about Imagine Dragons?"

"It was an accident, actually. I'm a big fantasy novel reader and was Googling dragons to find a new book and they came up on my search."
"cool. I'm a big fan of Sci-fi. how many grand children do you have?"

"I have 4, all boys! The eldest got married last spring and are expecting! This old man is about to be a great grandpa!"
"awesome. Have you thought about buying a RV to visit all of them?"

"I have. I'd go travel in winter when I don't have the garden to tend to."
"nice. Yes, I am considering buying a Van."

"You can get some awesome vans now that you can practically live in. The minimalist movement has really paved a way for that lifestyle."
"yes, I've heard of Radioactive. listen to music while running"

yeah they can't seem to figure out the reason behind it. They think its all the gardening that is causing it. Does cycling cause you pain in the knees?

"I just saw and interesting exhibit about how we domesticated dogs from wolves at the local museum! You should check it out! I bet you'd enjoy it."
"that sounds very interesting . i'll have to see that ."

"I have memberships to all the museums in town. I'd love to take you as my plus one sometime! I go to a museum every weekend."
"wow, awesome. Yes, I'd love to go sometime."

"To be honest, the children's museum. I take my son there and together we play and it makes me feel like a little kid again too! "
"its on my to do list for sure . i want to see the dinosaurs ."

"The museum of natural history has a mummy exhibit next month. You might like that since you mentioned you like historic artifacts."
"I really enjoy going to museums to look at historic artifacts.  But I have never been to one in Chicago.  Which museum is your favorite?"

"I think the dinosaur exhibit is a permanent exhibit..."
"I love fossils! thanks."

"That's awesome! I used to do volunteer work at an animal rescue too while I studied at Princeton! I loved helping those furry faces!"
"right. I've just started. I was doing IT. And I like working on my feet."

column3:
wow, modern music has been boring last few years, from 2015. Why do you like a Honda Civic?
My favorite car brand is honda, and its good for traveling with my four children.

yes. I also like Toyota. So where have you traveled?
Theme parks and national parks on fun days, work and school on usual days.

nice. Houston's theme park closed. Had a full 360 degree loop ride. Ever been?
no but I have visited and have went to the theme parks, it was fun.

nice. Where do you like to buy cars? I've always bought red cars. I think they are more safe also.
Thanks. I like to search online then pick up the car at the dealer. Red cars are classic and are safer for they are noticed more.

I used to ride motorcycles. Drivers are safer now, but also the mobile phone use is up.
Interesting, thanks for letting me know. Also, perhaps they can have the phone auto-turn-off during driving somehow.

yeah, makes sense. reminds me of a book I read about Google, and their push into self driving cars. Do you like to read?
Interesting, I'll check it out! I've always found AI so cool as to how it works. I think self driving would make work life easier.
column4:
وای، موسیقی مدرن چند سال اخیر خیلی خسته کننده بوده، از سال 2015. چرا شما از هوندا سیویک خوشتان می‌آید؟

بله. من هم دوست دارم تویوتا. پس تو کجا سفر کردی؟

خوبه. پارک تمای هیوستون بسته شد. یک مسیر با ۳۶۰ درجه کامل داشت. تا حالا رفتی؟

خوب. شما کجا دوست دارید ماشین بخرید؟ من همیشه ماشین‌های قرمز خریده‌ام. فکر می‌کنم آن‌ها ایمن‌تر هم هستند.

من قبلا با موتور سواری می‌کردم. رانندگان اکنون ایمن‌تر هستند، اما استفاده از تلفن همراه نیز افزایش یافته است.

بله، منطقی است. یادم از یک کتابی می‌افتد که درباره گوگل و تلاش آن‌ها برای ورود به حوزه ماشین‌های خودران بود. آیا شما دوست دارید کتاب بخوانید؟
column5:
برند مورد علاقه من اتومبیل هوندا است و برای سفر با چهار فرزندم مناسب است.

پارک‌های تم و پارک‌های ملی در روزهای شاد، کار و مدرسه در روزهای عادی.

نه اما من ازدید کرده و به پارک های تمیز رفته ام، خیلی خوب بود.

ممنون. من دوست دارم آنلاین جستجو کنم و سپس ماشین را از نمایندگی بخرم. ماشین‌های قرمز کلاسیک هستند و برای اینکه بیشتر دیده شوند، ایمن‌تر هستند.

جالبه، ممنون که به من اطلاع دادی. همچنین، شاید بتوانند به نحوی تلفن را خودکار خاموش کنند هنگام رانندگی.

جالبه، من یه نگاهی بهش می‌اندازم! همیشه به عنوان چطور کار می‌کنه، هوش مصنوعی رو خیلی جالب پیدا کردم. فکر می‌کنم رانندگی خودکار می‌تونه زندگی کاری رو آسون‌تر کنه.

column3:
"Yeah, I actually don't watch a lot of baseball, but I try to follow the world series a little."
"I watch a lot of baseball but i play basketball more often. in fact I am currently training with my personal coach"

"Cool, do you play professionally? Or are you trying to make a career out of it?"
"I was an avid runner in high school and found my interest in basketball in college. I am training to make it a career now. How about you? "

"I am in the automotive sales business. I source cars for a large business."
"i see, how did you find your interest in auto?"

"I have just always loved cars since a young age. I love talking about cars with people, and advising them on which ones are good to buy."
"I am looking for a vehicle currently. Any suggestions?"

"Toyota and Honda makes the most reliable cars, hands down. Corollas and Camrys run forever. Stay away from German cars."
"why do you say that"

"I very consistently see Toyotas with over 200k miles. I see a lot of German cars that have issues before they even hit 100k, plus they depreciate heavily."
"ohhhh okay that makes more sense"

column3:
'We could never have to many registered nurses'
'There will always be sick people. '

"Aren't you worried about getting sick yourself?"
'Not really. we take precausions to prevent that. Besides, sick people need someone who wants to be with them no matter what they have.'

'Does that require you to be away from your spouse for long periods of time?'
'Yes. Espeacially if you work at a hospital'

'How would one try to become an RN'
'There are courses for it at most colleges. Takes two to four years to get, but if you love helping people, then it is worth it.'

'I would really love to join a part of the medical field, all it takes is dedication and hard work to achieve anything!'
'That is so true. If more people would realize their potential the world would be so much better'

"I couldn't agree with you more."
'Too many people are lazy and look for the easy way though'

column3:
"I'm sorry to hear that.  Why are you insecure?"
"I am not insecure."
"Which do you prefer, selling houses or waitressing?"
"I like selling houses more because I don't have to interact with lots of people."
"You prefer the one on one relationships.  I can understand that.  Have you been selling houses a long time?"
"Exactly. I have been selling houses since I was 12 years old!"
"Really!  That is impressive.  What kinds of houses?"
"mostly larger houses that celebrities buy. I sold one once for $10 million."
"How were you able to sell houses when you ere 12?"
"Well it wasn't just me, my parents helped me through the process. But my name was on the sign!"
"That's impressive.  How many years have you been selling houses?"
"Well I'm 100 now so about 88 years!"
"I think you are Joking but it's been fun chatting"
"I was hehe. great chatting with you"

چطور می‌دانی چنین چیزهایی؟

این یکی خوبه! من شخصاً یک پیشخدمت هستم.

مطمئنم که زیادی از مردم در فروشگاه مواد غذایی از شما می‌خواهند که به چیزهایی که روی قفسه بالا هستند دسترسی پیدا کنید.

"Like what?' 'I would buy more pink cars. maybe a thousand of them!'
"Google bought YouTube in November 2006 for $1.65 Billion. Imagine what you could do with that much money."

"you can travel with all your cars. think about it! "
"I would travel, buying cars sound great, that would be awesome. But I would prefer traveling."

"how hard would it be to drive to Antarctica?"
"Yeah, depending on the destination travel could be really easy or really hard."

"That's true. Can I come with?"
"I think nearly impossible, but I wold be happy to take a flight even though it would not be cheap and then take a boat."

You can actually count cards to make an informed guess, but it is usually frowned upon in casinos.
I don't have the best of luck at casinos.

Yes, I am a dealer in a casino, and I can say that it takes tons of practice.
Do you have to have a special talent to be a dealer?

No, not really. You can generally learn the skills on the job while being trained, but it helps to be outgoing.
Is it fun learning to become a dealer?

Yes, I love it. Plus you can make really good tip money if you like to talk to people.
Do dealers encounter many issues with players?

Sometimes. It usually is due to people being intoxicated, but security is usually pretty good about taking over in those issues.
It seem like becoming a dealer would be a fun job to pursue, I would love to learn to become a dealer.

I would definitely recommend it. It is relatively easy, and a lot of fun.
Thanks so much for the information.

I need to always carry a book with me.. and have a a good cup of coffee too.
I can't stand coffee. I usually prefer a nice cup of tea!

Tea works for me too. What kind of books do you like?
I like auto-biographies mostly, which most people find boring. What about you?

I like those too, and also fiction. Some authors are good mixing fiction with real places and people, those are my favorite.
Yeah, I definitely see the appeal with fiction. Reading is an escape for some people!

To me reading is a need. But is not my only hobby, I also love sports and music.
Oh I absolutely agree. What's your favorite sport?

I love soccer and swimming, and things that you can do with a lot of friends, hiking too. And do you have a favorite sport?
I love swimming and hiking as well. I don't know too much about soccer though.

That is cool, the nice thing about swimming is that you can go to really nice places, like the ocean, a river or a lake.
I agree. I think besides a regular pool, the ocean is my favorite place to swim! Sometimes rivers and lakes are too mucky.

yeah..working out is fun yes it is! extends your life

Yes, there is a vegan section in the deli. It used to be small but not anymore.
 It is really cool that the vegan section has expanded! I like to eat organic, and I am on a low carb diet.

Good for you! I did the same for a month and felt great!
Awesome! It's so hard to find good vegan substitutes, but I think it's worth it.

Yes, I takes a lot of effort. I think taking care of your health is a great goal.
And it takes a healthy diet to lead a healthy life! It also takes good music! So what is your favorite band?

Music is health to me! I love U2, Nirvana and many others, I am also learning to play the guitar. How about you?
I am a vocalist, and my favorite band is Bon Iver. I like all kinds of music.

That is awesome! I also like different kinds of music like jazz and even classical.
Jazz is beautiful, do you ever get to go to jazz clubs?

I have not, I have gone to jazz festivals, but it would be cool to go to a nice jazz club.
Jazz music is seen as America's classical music. Should totally try it sometime.

column3:
"Thanks! I'm also looking to learn how to write in cursive, do you know any local classes?"
"I haven't written in cursive since grade school. However, my ex-wife knows Caligraphy. I suggest taking an online class to practice up."

"Okay, I'll look online. Are there any concerts going on soon? I like to listen to some strange music."
"Shpongle is a weird group. I think they are touring this winter."

"Great. What are you doing today?"
"It is just starting to get cold, so I am going to put the roof on my Jeep Wrangler."

"That's a good idea, I should start preparing for winter as well."
"Yeah. This summer was so hot!!!!!!!!! I am hoping for a chilly fall and frigid winter!!!"

"I agree! I'm excited to see what winter brings into the area."
"I'm sure we are going to get pounded with snow. Gotta watch out for the black ice!!!"

"Yes! I'd better get to the store soon to pick up some salt. When do you guys normally start seeing snow around here?"
"Usually in December but with climate change we could get a November blizzard!"

column3:
"Yes. I can't believe he would do this knowing what I'm going through with the divorce!"
"Yeah, well, my big brother once hit me in the head with the claw end of a hammer."

"What a jerk! If I was there I could've helped you, since I'm in my second year of medical school."
"Ha-ha.  Yeah, no doubt.  I was just a kid and kind of indestructible.  We fought a lot."

"That's very unfortunate. I hope my two kids never fight that way. Are you on good terms with your brother now?"
"We are great friends now.  I don't get to see him so much since I'm on tour with my band."

"I'm happy to hear that, I hope you get to seem him soon. Maybe he can come to see one of your shows."
"Yeah, he's been to a few.  I was hoping we could do X-mas with the whole family.  Maybe next year."

"I don't know how Christmas is gonna go with my family this year either... it's hard to be divorced when there's two kids mixed in."
"Divorce is the WORST.  I, too, am divorced.  Worst experience of my life.  I don't speak to my ex."

"I'm sorry to hear that. It's very hard. I'm just ready to be done with the process."
"It will get better over time.  Focus on your kids if you can.  It's gotta be rough.  Oh and get another partner!"
column4:
بله. نمی‌توانم باور کنم که او این کار را انجام داده است و با خبر است که من با طلاق دست و پنجه نرم می‌کنم!

چه احمقی! اگر من اونجا بودم می‌تونستم بهت کمک کنم، چون من در سال دوم دانشکده پزشکی هستم.

این بسیار ناروا است. امیدوارم دو فرزند من هرگز به این شکل با هم دعوا نکنند. آیا اکنون با برادرتون روابط خوبی دارید؟

من خوشحالم که اینو شنیدم، امیدوارم به زودی بتونی اون رو ببینی. شاید بیاد تا یکی از نمایش‌هایت رو ببینه.

من نمی‌دانم که امسال کریسمس چطور با خانواده‌ام خواهد بود... سخت است که طلاق داشته باشی و دو فرزند هم داشته باشی.

متاسفم که این را شنیدم. خیلی سخت است. من فقط آماده اتمام این فرآیند هستم.
column5:
"آره، خب، برادر بزرگم یک بار با سر ناخنی یک چکش به سرم زد."

"ها ها. بله، بدون شک. من فقط یک بچه بودم و کمی نابودپذیر بودم. ما زیاد جنگیدیم."

ما دوستان خوبی هستیم. من او را خیلی نمی‌بینم چون من با گروهم در تور هستم.

"آره، او چند تا رفته. من امیدوار بودم که بتونیم کریسمس رو با تمام خانواده بگذرونیم. شاید سال آینده."

طلاق بدترین چیزه. من هم طلاق گرفتم. بدترین تجربه زندگی من بود. با سابقه ازدواجی ارتباط ندارم.

با گذر زمان بهتر خواهد شد. اگر می‌توانید، بر روی فرزندانتان تمرکز کنید. حتماً سخت است. اوه، و یک شریک دیگر پیدا کنید!

column3:
"Oh, that's the same year my son was born.  Do you have kids?"
"Yes I have 3 and big kid (husband)."

"Ha that's funny.  Some men never grow up."
"Yes do your kids still live at home?"

"No my kids are grown and have moved out.  Its kind of quiet sometimes but I like to get out and hike."
"Yes it is nice when they are independent, I didnt think I would adjust as well as I am."

"Do they live close enough to see them when you want?"
"Real close!  With me, LOL ;-) But they are in college and busy with work and school."

"Oh that's an exciting time.  Two of my 3 live nearby but my oldest is 1800 miles away on the west coast"
"My oldest is talking of a move to California, how do feel about the distance with a child?"

"Well it is difficult but you just have to make time to go see them.  He lives in a gorgeous area and I can hike alot there."
"Yes it is nice to have a common interest and that you enjoy vacation there.  Any grandkids yet?"

"yes 4 grandkids and that is very fun.  Be wary of California with all the wildfires"
"I KNOW!  We visited LA last November and brought masks"

"It's unfortunate.  My son is in Oregon and they struggle all summer long"
"Oh gosh, the smoke is there too?  I didnt know that."

ها، این خنده داره. بعضی مردا هرگز بزرگ نمی‌شن.

نه، فرزندانم بزرگ شده‌اند و خانه را ترک کرده‌اند. گاهی وقت‌ها خیلی ساکت است اما من دوست دارم بیرون بروم و پیاده‌روی کنم.

آیا آنها به اندازه کافی نزدیک زندگی می کنند که زمانی که می خواهید آنها را ببینید؟

این زمان هیجان انگیزی است. دو تایی از سه تایی که من دارم در نزدیکی زندگی می کنند اما پیرترین فرزندم ۱۸۰۰ مایل دورتر در ساحل غربی زندگی می کند.

"خب این سخت است اما شما فقط باید زمان برای دیدن آنها بگذارید. او در منطقه‌ای زیبا زندگی می‌کند و من می‌توانم زیاد در آنجا پیاده‌روی کنم."

بله ۴ نوه و این خیلی جالب است. از کالیفرنیا با تمام آتش‌سوزی‌ها مراقب باشید.

متاسفانه. پسرم در اورگان است و آن‌ها تمام تابستان درگیری دارند.

"I am not much of a rollerblader ot hockey player. I spent most of my tiem travelling so I don't really have tiem for that."
"You sound fun! How often do you get to travel? Do you get to work out?"

"My travel is my workout, getting around and always up and going. In fact, ill be going to the barbados next month"
"You are so lucky! I love the Caribbean but I have never been there. I hope you have a great time"

"thanks, carribeans are nice but Jamaica is my favorite."
"You are so lucky! Jamaican culture is very vibrant. I hear the food is amazing"

"yes it is, have you been?"
"No but I would like to one day. Life goals."

"I recommend attending their traditional ceremonies. They are so educational and interesting."
"History is one my favorites as well and will check it out when I go, thank you"

"let me be your tiur guide if you go"
"That would be awesome, always helps to have an expert"

من خیلی حرفه‌ای در اسکیت رولر یا هاکی نیستم. بیشتر وقتم را در سفر گذراندم، بنابراین واقعا وقت کافی برای این کارها ندارم.

سفر من تمرین من است، حرکت و همیشه فعال. در واقع، من ماه آینده به باربادوس خواهم رفت.

column3:
How many people die from skydiving each year? I'm not sure but probably a lot.
I definitely want to try it before I finally give up the ghost. It must be exciting your first time. I need to work on fear first and then I will try it.
Yes, sir! I get chills just imagining stepping out onto the wing of the plane. That's amazing. I have only been on a few planes in my life.
It would be great to fly through the air high above some beautiful Nevada desert. Agreed, that would be badass.
Could you imagine? It would be like sky diving on Mars. I don't think we could do that. NASA wouldn't let us.
Yeah but maybe Elon Musk can find a way to get around NASA's red tape. i dunno, i think we still gotta get on the moon for the first real time.

"Why doesn't it seem nice? I think it is ideal"
"I was in a movie when I was young, played an individual who was married, marriage is hard!"

"I see, ok. Are you still acting?"
"On and off, I hope to be a star one day, just gotta keep plugging at it"

"That is really cool! What made you want to be an actor?"
"I was in TV commericials when I was young and that got me started"

"That's great. I wish you luck with your career"
"Thanks, I apprreciate that.  Hope your patential marriage foes well as well"

"Thank you! I love my gf a lot, and look forward to spending my life with her"
"that's amazing , commitment is great but marriage you definately have to work at ."

"I believe it! My brother is married, and he tells me that it's a lot of work, but worth it"
"Agreed.  Lots of happy storeis out there"

"Ah, that's interesting. I love reading, especially comics."
"Everywhere. I love to teach people from other cultures and help them improve their lives."
"Where do you like to travel?"
"to new york , my brother lives there he attends west point"
"Fascinating. I tend to travel close to home because I only travel by train. Where are you traveling to next?"
"I also like comic books, so called comic magazines, i like old ones also"
"I used to live in NY, it's amazing there. They have a lot of comic book stores, I always visit so many whenever I'm there."
"For me, The Bible, and then travel books, fiction and pretty much I read everything. What about you?"
"What is your favorite genre of book to read?"
"Good for you, reading is like a universe, so many options.."
"I also enjoy fiction. I also occasionally enjoy reading books about zoology."

همه جا. من دوست دارم به افراد از فرهنگ‌های دیگر آموزش دهم و به آن‌ها کمک کنم تا زندگی‌شان را بهبود بخشند.

column3:
A caregiver is someone who takes care of people who cannot ordinarily take care of themselves.
I did a little bit of that when I was in college.  I took care of a few autistic adults.  It was emotional.

That must have been an interesting experience. I've read about adults with autism, it sounds quite difficult. What did you learn from the experience?
One thing was how big their personalities could be.  My guy was hilarious.  He told great jokes!

That's very interesting. What did you go into after college?
I went to work in Silicon Valley for a semiconductor company.  I should have tried out for Dancing with the Stars!

That sounds like a cool job. I dropped out of high school, and a few years later started a small business with my dad.
W

column3:
"I can't wait for the Washington Nationals parade to celebrate their World Series win."
"I am also eagerly waiting for the moment"

"What a great series.  I was biting my nails the entire time.  I thought Houston was going to pull it out."
"That nice .You seems very eager to this.isn't it?"

"Yeah.  I like having baseball on in the background while I work.  I also love the stats.  Fun!"
"I hope the home team wins."

"I cheer for the home team usually, too.  Unless of course, the home team is the Yankees."
"I love the Yankees."

"Are you from New York?"
"Yes, I am one of the 325 million people who live in the United States."

"Oh, we've got that many people now?  Wow.  It sure is getting crowded."
"Sure is."

column3:
I agree! Math is way too hard. If you need help you can always ask though!
That's true. What are you studying math for?

I had to take some math classes to finish my nursing degree. I only took them because they were mandatory though. Why are you studying math?
I'm hoping to go into engineering. So I better improve my math! Don't want to be serving tables forever.

You can do it! I'm more of an athlete. I have travelled lots for competitions which was great. Have you travelled anywhere?
Last year, I went to Belarus. It was really interesting, the country is almost lost in time. Have you ever been to Eastern Europe?

That's awesome! I'm truly jealous. I would love to do more travelling but it's so expensive. Did you travel alone or with friends / family?
I went with a friend from my university. I enjoyed the food, but I definitely missed American cuisine too.

That's awesome! I live in Canada and we have poutine so that's even worse for you! Have you tried poutine before!?
Yes, I have. It's really tasty! I like the gravy.

My favourite thing about American food is the french fries - I probably eat too many for my own good!
I live in Canada and we have poutine so that's even worse for you! Have you tried poutine before!?

column3:
ughhhh i was proud that i graduated but i don't do anything with my degree
"Well you should be proud of graduating.  Why didn't you do anything with your degree?"

Because whenever I get an interview they always say "we decided to move forward with someone else". It's too much work to keep going to those stupid interviews anyways.
"Well you will never get in if you don't keep trying?  What are you doing instead?"

Just watching Shark Tank. They have it so easy. I just have to think of something that'll sell and then I'll never have to work! 
"Well that seems like a lot of work and a little risky but I am sure you can think of a good idea"

I know right? It's why I can't think of anything. I wish that I was more imaginative and could think of something. What do you watch? 
"well I like Naked and afraid but I would never do the show.  I have problems with interviews too when they see my hair"

OMG that's so much work. And what's wrong with your hair? I bet you have nicer hair than me though 
"Really?  My hair is blue and orange right now"

like Auburn? Do you watch college football? I love Auburn's team 
"I watch some college football but not a lot.  My hair is blue and orange now but will be pink and purple next"

"A year ago. I'm in Houston, waitressing at a local club since she passed. I'm hoping to move to Australia soon with my BF though."
"Australia, that sounds exciting!  Why there?"

"My family is from Perth"
"Wow, and how did you end up in Houston?"

"My boyfriend is in the military and it was this or Fort Worth"
"I see.  Ive never met anyone from Australia here in states."

"We have an accent so I'm told but I think people here have the accent :D"
"Yes we definelty speak differently, I love an Aussie accent!!"

"Try listening to an old Australian man from the outback and you'll need a robot translator"
"I was wondering if there were different sub languages or dialects"

"Oh yes. But the older and more sun baked you get, the more it becomes like an ewok village the remote places lol"
"Are than many... dialects?"

column3:
"Not really. Let's talk about food. What do you like to eat? I LOVE fish"
"I like fish too. But really I am not picky. Do you eat a lot of fish?"
"I eat pretty much only fish. My parents do too, and they're both over 6 feet. Probably cause of the fish LOL"
"Possibly. How do you like to prepare your fish?"
"I LOVE salmon. Sear it with some rosemary, lots of butter, and some lemon. to DIE FOR."
"That sounds wonderful - what do you like for side dishes? I eat lots of veggies"
"Some shittake mushrooms and asparagus stirfried with olive oil - I'm a big keto fan so it suits fish"
"I like the way you think - and EAT! Sounds very healthy"
"I'm just worried about where I get my fish - sometime i get scared about mercury and other toxins"
"Yes, I have that worry too - you can never be sure, can you?"
"It's why I pay extra for wild salmon and organic stuff - call me a health nut but when I'm 95 who's laughing? LOL"
"95? That's amazing. Maybe you should write a book"

من تقریباً فقط ماهی می‌خورم. پدر و مادرم هم همینطورن و هر دو بالای ۶ فوت قد دارند. احتمالاً به خاطر ماهیه LOL

column3:
"I usually watch matches with relatives. It's sort of a family tradition!"
"That's awesome! Family traditions are the best! Did you do anything for Halloween? It was an excuse to eat chocolate for me."

"I bought a lot of candy to hand out, but not many kids showed up! So now I'm stuck with a lot of chocolate, and way too much candy!"
"Hey, that sounds like a win to me! More candy for you! What do you like to do for fun?"

"I play for my college's basketball team. Between that and my studies, I don't have much free time. What about you?"
"That sounds fun! I'm pretty busy with studies too but i like to geocache with my boyfriend. What do you study? "

"That's really cool. I'm studying education, hoping to become a teacher. What are your career ambitions?"
"Cool! My boyfriend is in education as well and is on his first placement. I'm in my senior year of psychiatric nursing. Are you enjoying it?"

"Very interesting. I am enjoying it, yes. I'm a bit nervous about entering the job market though. Congrats to your boyfriend! What got you interested in psychiatric nursing?"
"Well we always need new amazing teachers so I'm sure you'll be fine. I was very interested in both nursing and pscyhology and that's psych nursing!"

"Thank you. It sounds like you've found the perfect career fit!"
"You too! I'm sure you will make a fabulous teacher and I wish you the best!"

column3:
Well she was doing quite well with putting books on the shelf at least. So she should be good to go. AT least she isn't like me, 2 years pre med, 2 kids, divorced. I wish I had a job that calming!
Well working as a librarian can be calming for the most part for sure. Sometimes that quiet time gets annoying though. I am not used to the quiet! It must be a lot of organizing for you every day.
I haven't been working here long so it isn't bad so far. I imagine I'll get tired of the sorting eventually though. yes! Yin and yang, balance in all things. You'll do great there.
I love the learning part. Like just the other day I ran across this book "Swimming for Dummies" which was terrific since I don't know how to swim! i think you might be able to teach yourself but its better to get professionally taught.
You might be right about that. Being an adult, I have so much anxiety over water as a result. oh yes anxiety is a terrible thing, you are brave to deal with it. It won't take that long and you'll be squared away
Yep, or at the bottom of a lake somewhere. So how was med school anyway? honestly it was boring! The hours are brutal. It's nice knowing I am able to save lives and help others.

"Too experienced for me. I have 2 left feet."
"We have been away past 2 weekends and I just want to be home, plus I'm sick."
"Honestly, I don't care much about looking good while I dance. I just like to have fun! What do you like to do for fun?"
"We have been away past 2 weekends and I just want to be home, plus I'm sick."
"That's okay. You can't be good at everything! Do you have any plans for this weekend?"
"Yes me too, I have been sick with cold going on 4 weeks."
"That's okay. You can't be good at everything! Do you have any plans for this weekend?"
"I was actually the first week and had my flu shot then."
"That's understandable. It's nice to relax at home. I hope you get better soon!"
"I was home sick, but we had trick or treaters!"
"Yikes that's a long time! Have you been to a doctor?"
"Not yet, have you?"
"Oh okay. Hopefully they get the flu shot right this year. I still have to get it. Did you celebrate Halloween yesterday?"
"Not yet, have you?"
"That's good! Hopefully you'll be healthy for Christmas at least! Have you started shopping for that already?"

"Yeah, it's super nice! The sound system is great!"
"I bet! How much did it cost you?"

"I got it used for only $15,000!"
"Wow that's a great deal! Did you buy it online or from a friend?"

"I bought it online. I was looking for something with plenty of space."
"Yeah I bet it's useful for shopping and fitting all your friends and family into, right?"

"It's perfect for that! Can fit the entire family with no one complaining about it being cramped."
"I bet! Having a car like that would make me want to go on a long road trip!"

"Oh its so good! I like listening to rock music and just finding new roads to drive on!"
"rock music is great for listening to while driving! I also really like to listen to korean pop music because it has a catchy beat when you're driving."

That is interesting, why toto?
My parents loved The Wizard of Oz, and so they named their company after the dog.

So your parents started the business and you have taken over?
Yeah. They retired a few years ago, I'm the head of the company now.

Isn't there a band with the same name?
I think so. Wasn't it a pop group from California?

Ya that is it, they were popular in the 80's
Right. What kinds of music are you into?

I lean more to classic rock but enjoy all gendres
Nice. I'm going to a rock festival next month.

Awesome where is the festival going to be?
Bridgetown, Barbados! My wife and I are very excited to go.

column3:
"I'm trying to lose weight for my upcoming skiing competition! Do you do any sports? "
"Not, really. I just go to work in bicycle sometimes."

"That's awesome! Great for both you and the environment! Where do you work?"
"I take care of kids at a family house. It is about 20 minutes in bicycle. "

'That sounds like an awesome job! I love kids. Do you have any of your own or want any in the future?'
'I don´t  have any kids yet. But I want to some day. Do you have kids?'

"Yeah I have two kids! A one year old boy and a 3 year old girl. No regrets! What do you like to do for fun?"
"Those are great ages! I love outdoor activities in my big yard. I like BBQ and playing cards or just chilling in summer."

"Oh man that sounds so nice! I'm looking out my window at the snow and missing summer. Do you live somewhere hot or do you get snow too?"
"I get a lot of snow, Which I find interesting too, but also miss summer. Where do you live?"

'I live in Canada. I hate the cold, its unbearable! Where do you live? '
"Ohh. Haven´t you thought about moving? I live in West Virginia, USA."

column3:
"I got a job as an account, I've been here for three months now. I'm crushing it :-)"
'Wow Congrats! I recently got a job as a radio host! I love it.'

"Interesting! what time of day do you work? "
"Usually early mornings because that's when people are commuting to work. What about you?"

"that's the only time of day I listen to the radio! My hours are regular office hours. I am really enjoying my new gig. sounds like you are too? "
'Ahh so the typical 9-5? My husband is the same, but he usually works overtime by having to go to corporate dinners haha. Yeah I love it.'

'Yep exactly. Do you get lots of people calling in to your show? '
'Not usually, people only really call in for the competitions we run. '

"ah ha. I've actually called in and won on radio shows before! do you get decent vacation time? "
"Really?! What did you win? Yeah, it's the standard amount you'd expect really, but every day feels like a holiday when you love your job :)"

"I totally agree! You gotta do what you love, find the right mix of people! I've won concert tickets!"
'Wow really? To see who? I recently went to see BTS live, that was absolutely amazing. I love any type of pop music haha.'

column3:
"Well, those are all numbers."
"that's true. in theory the numbers work, but you can only know for sure once the solar panels are installed."
"I'd love to have the panels but math isn't my strong point."
'maybe a qualified electrician in the field can help you crunch the numbers.'
"that would be most good."
"now, i need your advice. my mom is allergic to dogs and i've got two dogs as pets. how can i make my home inviting for mom?"
"Can the dogs be put in another room when she visits?"
'i do that already, though she still gets symptoms. maybe i can use solar power to power a uv allergen zapper.'
"Now that's a new idea! I love it."
'since we both would like to install panels, I think we should arrange for the same company to do the work.'
"Do you know anyone who's had it done? Someone who could offer recommendation?"
"Yes, my brother had his whole house off grid with Green Solars Energy. Great company and affordable."

بله، برادرم خانه‌اش را کاملاً خارج از شبکه با انرژی خورشیدی سبز داشت. شرکت عالی و قابل تحمل بود.

column3:
Wow. That must be amazing. I am planning one with my boyfriend. Have you always had good experiences or any bad ones?
we enjoy them...I know not everyone's cut out for cruises, but you should give one a try!

yes. I am excited about it. What is the longest you have been in one?
about 10 days, but we've mostly done one week cruises. I love the relaxation and getting time for mediation

I see. 10 days sounds good enough!
Oh, it's amazing! when we have more vacation time we might go for a two week one. We have stopped at lots of interesting places!

Weren't you nervous the first time? I am sometimes scared of the see. LOL
I was a little scared of being seasick. but I brought some stuff along just in case. You should do that too.

Ok. Thank you. I will definitely do that.
what other kinds of vacations have you enjoyed? One of the best things about a cruise is there's something for everyone!

I love the beach. But I have gone there either in airplane or car. Mostly in car and it has been about 20 hours!
I looooove long road trips. The beach is my happy place, btw! Nothing like relaxing w/toes in sand1
column4:
واو. حتما باید شگفت‌انگیز باشد. من هم یک سفر با دوست پسرم دارم برنامه‌ریزی کنم. آیا همیشه تجربه‌های خوبی داشته‌ای یا تجربه‌های بدی هم داشته‌ای؟

خب. ممنونم. حتما این کار را انجام می‌دهم.

ما از آنها لذت می‌بریم... می‌دانم که همه افراد برای سفرهای دریایی مناسب نیستند، اما شما باید یک بار امتحان کنید!

حدود ۱۰ روز، اما بیشتر کروزهای یک هفته‌ای انجام داده‌ایم. من عاشق آرامش و داشتن زمان برای تأمل هستم.

اوه، این فوق‌العاده است! وقتی ما بیشتر زمان تعطیل داشته باشیم ممکن است برای دو هفته برویم. ما در بسیاری از جاهای جالب توقف کرده‌ایم!

من کمی از مری دریا می ترسیدم. اما برای احتیاط، چند تا چیز همراهم آوردم. تو هم باید این کار را انجام دهی.

چه اقسام سفرهای دیگری را دوست داشته‌اید؟ یکی از بهترین ویژگی‌های یک کروز این است که برای همه چیزی وجود دارد!

من سفرهای طولانی را عاشقم. ساحل مکان خوشحالی من است، به هر حال! هیچ چیزی مثل آرام شدن با پاها در شن نیست!
