column3:
I have heard of the cha-cha and mambo. The others are new to me. Do you like to go dancing?
Yes, I like dancing a lot but I step on toes sometimes with stylized steps. I can do a little salsa, though.

That is wonderful! I don't dance. However, I love the costumes! If I see one that I like, I just buy it!
The costumes are the best! Especially flamingo garb.

Yes! I like to collect quite a bit of vintage costumes. I have quite the collection. Do you collect also?
Hmmm, my collection is mostly special paint brushes.

That sounds neat! Where do you shop for them at?
Sometimes new online, but also some artists keep their brushes in good condition and a really good one usually comes from Germany.

Oh! I did not know that. Fascinating!
Yeah, the wood quality and the brush hairs can make all the difference with certain brush strokes styles.

Yes, my neighbor is an artist and I heard her talking about that through the fence to her artist group. They spend a fortune on brushes.
Oh man, the paints can get exorbitant too, especially those with cobalt.

من از چاچا و مامبو شنیده‌ام. بقیه برای من تازه‌اند. آیا شما دوست دارید برای رقصیدن بروید؟

این عالیه! من رقص نمی‌کنم. اما، من لباس‌هاشون رو دوست دارم! اگر یکی رو دیدم که دوست داشتم، فقط خریدمش!

بله! من دوست دارم که مجموعه‌ای از لباس‌های قدیمی داشته باشم. من یک مجموعه خوبی دارم. آیا شما هم مجموعه‌ای دارید؟

این خیلی جالب به نظر می‌رسد! شما از کجا برای خرید آن‌ها استفاده می‌کنید؟

اوه! من نمی‌دانستم. جالب!

بله، همسایه‌ام هنرمند است و من او را از طریق حصار با گروه هنرمندانش صحبت می‌کردند شنیدم. آن‌ها مقدار زیادی پول برای خرید برس صرف می‌کنند.

لباس‌ها بهترین‌ها هستند! به ویژه لباس فلامینگو.

هممم، بیشتر مجموعه من از برس‌های ویژه رنگ است.

گاهی اوقات هنرمندان جدید آنلاین هستند، اما برخی هنرمندان نیز قلم‌های خود را در شرایط خوب نگه می‌دارند و قلم خوبی معمولاً از آلمان می‌آید.

بله، کیفیت چوب و موهای برس می‌تواند تمام تفاوت را در سبک‌های خاص زدن با برس ایجاد کند.

اوه مرد، رنگ‌ها هم می‌توانند بسیار گران باشند، به ویژه آن‌هایی که حاوی کبالت هستند.

column3:
My son did not mention he was stopped by the police for speeding last week.
Did he get a ticket or did they let him off with a warning?

This will be his second ticket in 3 months.
How old is your son? Does he still live with you?

Yes, he is 17 years old.
You should ground him for a while, multiple tickets that close together is pretty serious. You don't want him to lose his license.

You are correct. Not only is he grounded, he is unable to use the car for quite some time.
Hopefully he learns his lesson, his safety should be a priority.

We explained his safety and that of others are our main concern.
That's good. He's still in high school, right? I used to play soccer in high school.

Yes, he is and a very good student athlete. He made a bad choice and have to learn from the consequences.
I used to be the same way in high school, I tried to show off while driving a lot and got multiple tickets.

you should do it ASAP, well it depends where do live or work,because for me carrying a gun is so important
I learned to shoot a gun in the military so I have had lots of practice. My state has open carry and concealed depending on the situation.

yeah i think everyone should atleast know how to fire a gun ,sometimes unexpected things occur.
I agree 100 percent. It helps you not be as afraid in certain situations. We have several gun ranges close by. I need to go visit one.

well i dont usually go there but i have been there in the past.
I read a lot and see stories where a concealed gun holder helped save the day.

i have experienced such situations so no doubt you are true.
When I was growing up we would go out to my grandparents property and shoot cans out in the middle of nowhere. It was fun and good practice.

yeah thats really sounds fun , i wish i had a childhood like you.
Good memories, for sure. I am sure you had just as exciting a childhood, just different activities.

yeah not so exciting though
I have seen that you can learn to shoot bows too. That looks like fun. Maybe I should try that one time.

شما باید این کار را در اسرع وقت انجام دهید، خب، این بستگی به این دارد که شما کجا زندگی یا کار می‌کنید، زیرا برای من حمل یک اسلحه بسیار مهم است.

آره، فکر می‌کنم همه حداقل باید بدانند چگونه از یک تفنگ شلیک کنند، گاهی اوقات اتفاقات غیرمنتظره رخ می‌دهد.

خب من معمولاً به آنجا نمی‌روم اما در گذشته اونجا بوده‌ام.

من تجربه‌هایی از چنین وضعیت‌هایی داشته‌ام، بنابراین بدون شک شما درست می‌گویید.

بله، واقعاً خیلی جالب به نظر می‌رسد، کاش کودکی مثل شما داشته باشم.

آره، اما خیلی جذاب نیست.
column5:
من در ارتش یاد گرفتم چگونه از تفنگ استفاده کنم، بنابراین تمرین زیادی داشتم. ایالت من اجازه حمل آزاد و پنهان بسته به شرایط دارد.

موافقم صد در صد. این به شما کمک می کند تا در برخی مواقع کمتر ترسیده باشید. ما چندین محل تیراندازی نزدیک داریم. من باید یکی از آنها را ببینم.

من زیاد می‌خوانم و داستان‌هایی می‌بینم که یک نهنگ دارنده‌ی مخفی کمک کرد تا روز را نجات دهد.

وقتی که بیشتر بزرگ می‌شدم، ما به مالکیت پدربزرگ و مادربزرگمان می‌رفتیم و در میانه جایی دورافتاده، بازی با قوطی‌ها می‌کردیم. این کار هم جالب بود و هم تمرین خوبی بود.

خاطرات خوب، قطعا. مطمئنم که دوران کودکی شما هم همانقدر جذاب بوده است، فقط فعالیت‌های متفاوتی داشته‌اید.

من دیدم که می‌توانید هم تیراندازی با کمان یاد بگیرید. به نظر می‌رسد خیلی سرگرم‌کننده است. شاید یکبار امتحان کنم.

I love to read, I use books as inspiration for my paintings.
I love reading books on the beach! That would be awesome.

I love panda bears as well, but I prefer to paint pictures of landscapes, or places such as cities or forests.
Have you ever painted a picture of a panda? Panda bears are my favorite animal.

Just around five years, I hope to be able to get into an art college soon.
How long have you been painting?

Yes I have, my best pieces are of New York city, I got a lot of inspiration from going there.
I hope so too! Have you put together a portfolio to see if scholarships were available?

It is very amazing, what else is on your bucket list?
I have never been, but New York city is on my bucket list!

I want to visit national parks and other natural wonders.
I want to vist Hawaii, and Australia. I would love to see a Panda bear in the wild. What about you?

من هم عاشق خرس‌های پاندا هستم، اما ترجیح می‌دهم تصاویر مناظر طبیعی یا مکان‌هایی مانند شهرها یا جنگل‌ها را نقاشی کنم.

She is a guitarist, so she plays every where she goes! I auditioned for guitar in a band last week.  Got rejected!  I feel less bad as the days pass.
Im sorry to hear that! I am sure you play awesome, how long have you been playing? Thanks. Playing for 10 years.  I'll try next week with another band.
I have always wanted to be a drummer! But i do not have the rhythm. Have you taken lesson? Maybe you could pick it up sooner or later.
I took lessons for 2 years and never got the hang of it. My favorite hobby is reading. Oh ok.  What do you like to read?
My favorite book is Jane Austins pride and prejudice! I must have read it over 10 times now. I'm not a big fiction reader.  But I did see the movie multiple times.

"I don't wear much jewelry but I love shopping online for clothes."
"i dont trust online sites , they are often deceptive"

"They can be deceptive, which is why I stick to the stores that I have shopped in personally."
"where do you usually shop?" "which ones are the cheapest?"

"Stores like Macy's, JCPenney, Forever 21."
"i am tall too, i will definetly try that someday. "

"You can always find sales at JCPenney especially around the holidays. I am tall and they have a better size selection online."
"thats funny but doesnt make any sense to be honest"

"They have big and tall stores but I am tall and skinny. Need to open a tall and skinny store."
"hahah , i bet i am much more skinny than you(47kgs)."

فروشگاه‌هایی مانند میسی، جی‌سی‌پنی و فوراور ۲۱.

می‌توانید همیشه تخفیف‌هایی در جی‌سی‌پنی پیدا کنید، به ویژه در اطراف تعطیلات. من قد بلندی دارم و آن‌ها انتخاب بهتری از سایزها آنلاین دارند.

خب از آنجا که همه شما به شام رفتید بدون من، من امیدوارم چون دعوت نشدم، حداقل یک دسر برایم بیاورید و خوشحال شوم.

ههه، این چقدر خوب میشه و اجازه بده آنها تعجب کنند که کویر ما چطوری است. من نمی‌خواهم اشتراک بگذارم.

من روش فکر کردن شما را دوست دارم. با شما به دست آوردن دوباره دوستانمان جالب خواهد بود. واو، من هم می‌خواهم شرکت کنم.

"That's actually one of my better qualities LOL"

"wow i like that mine too its a yorkie full of expression keeps me walking her at least twice a week"
"Me too. I inherited a large dog but my dad has a shih tzu I get to look after from time to time. "

"Have to really put in time with them. They are so demanding and territory"
"How sweet! I love yorkies, but I've never owned one. I'd like to someday!"

"Right like the walks spending time with them and understanding that they are like children"
"Some dogs require a lot of patience! Sounds easier than a chihuahua, though. Talk about demanding!"

"Yes true walks with dogs are very rewarding not only for the dogs but for us to. I try walking mine and a couple of friends to"
"It's worth it for the companionship, though. And walks are good for the exercise"

"Yes sound like a person can make this a job if they have the love for animals"

من عاشق سگ‌های کوچک هستم، تو ترجیحت چیه؟

"واو، من هم دوست دارم، سگ من هم یک یورکی است که پر از احساسات است و من روزانه حداقل دو بار با او قدم می زنم."

باید واقعا زمان زیادی را با آن‌ها صرف کنید. آن‌ها خیلی ادعایی و خودخواه هستند.

مانند پیاده روی هاست که وقت خود را با آنها می گذراند و متوجه می شود که آنها مانند کودکان هستند.

بله، قدم زدن با سگ‌ها بسیار پاداش‌بخش است، نه تنها برای سگ‌ها بلکه برای ما هم. من سعی می‌کنم سگ خودم و چند تا از دوستانم را پیاده‌روی ببرم.

بله، به نظر می‌رسد که اگر شخص علاقه‌مند به حیوانات باشد، می‌تواند این را به یک شغل تبدیل کند.

column3:
Nice, I have never heard gospel music before. Is there any famous songs you sing?
Have you ever listened to Christian radio? There is all kinds of styles, from Country to Classical. We mostly do our own stuff though we can take requests sometimes.

No I spend all my free time reading comic books, but I would to listen sometime. Do you write your own music?
Oh yeah! I play five instruments. What is your favorite comic book character?

Amazing! Which instruments? Superman is my favourite character for sure.
Drums, piccolo, guitar, bass guitar, and mandolin. My favorite is mandolin, though I do a mean bass.I think I like ol' spider man myself.

Wow that's impressive, did you learn to play all these instruments at a young age?
I got a small drum set at age five. Do you play an instrument?

No, I've attempted to learn the guitar a couple of times but I didn't have the patience for it. 
I had to wait until my hands grew, actually. I tried violin but it wasn't for me.

How come, do you not like that style of music? I would love to learn how to play the harp.
Violin is great really. I think I just liked the larger stringed instruments. Less painful to learn.

'I like to read too! What is your favorite genre?'
'I love self help books'

'Those are cool, but I am more into fantasy. What else do you do in your free time?'
'I watch workout videos on Youtube dude. Gotta get ripped!'

'I take it you go to the gym often, then?'
'Yep. At least 5 times a week.'

'What kind of workouts do you do?'
'A bit of calisthenics. Mostly weight lifting though.'

'Nice. I originally did weights for my training but I want to incorporate more cardio.'
"Yeah I'm trying to get more into running. Get a little more leaner."

"I might set a goal to run a half-marathon. Just to prove people wrong, you know? People say that because I'm a short woman I can't do it."
'Haha. Idk if height has anything to do with it. But giving your all is what counts.'

"I studied nonstop it seemed, but now that's over It really feels good."
'Awesome! When will you know the results?'
'Monday afternoon at the latest I was told, what have you been up too?'
"Just hitting the clubs and enjoying what's left of the nice weather!"
"G"
'What are you going to do now that the test is over? Feel like going out?'
"Was going to ask if you'd like to do something, I was thinking we could get outside, maybe do some hiking since the weather's still nice."
"I'll be busy through the day for the next few weeks -- but I'm free every evening this week except for Tuesday"
'That sounds even better, maybe go clubbing? what time Tuesday do you want to meet up?'
"I can't Tuesday. Any evening but that one. How about Thursday? They're having a party at Stix"
"OK, then Thursday it is. I'll meet you at Stix."
"What time? Want to go eat at Fogo's before?"

هه، هه. ما با طراحان داخلی خود به دنبال موهای زیبا و همه چیز هستیم!

Thank you! When the sun is out it is easy to have a good day! The other day I just curled up in a ball cuz of rain.
Aw man. You don't like the rain??
It was too cold! And then it got humid and penetrated my being. Usually I love it.
Ohhh. Yea I know what you mean.. I love to watch movies on a rainy day. Hbu?
I like to read on rainy days. I really like thunderstorms best. These I can't sit still for! I just watch for lightning.
What kind of books you read? Do you normally read for your past time?
I like history, but nothing beats a good romance for passing the time. What do you watch on TV?
Cool cool. Them romance novels will keep you warm ha. I usually play games. I don't watch TV much.
Computer games, I take it? What kind?
Ha, yeah definitely. A game called Quake. I play it constantly. You play any games?
Too addictive! I get stuck on bubble-shooter as it is. heh heh. My son liked Eve. Ever play that?
No. I'm pretty focused on Quake. Me and my friends even have a group to help us strategize. Haha.

"I definitely don't have a career in politics! Did the Speech Communications class help?"
"it did . what did you study or do for work ?"

"I'm in medical school. Hoping to be a surgeon someday"
"What field of medicine are you studying?"

"Cardiothoracic Surgery -- heart, lungs, that sort of thing."
"i like going to school but i don't have steady hands so no surgery for me ."

"Both of my parents are doctors. I grew up playing the game "Operation" if you've ever played that -- I was a champ!"
"Yes, but my parents were both clowns so it was really crazy when we got together to play games."

"LOL! We need to introduce them! It wouldn't hurt my parents to lighten up a little bit!"
"They would make me take the train with them to work. People would look at us strange!"

"Hee hee hee... no wonder you were leery of public speaking!"
"I am afraid of clowns now. Still taking the train to work. Do you take the train?"

column3:
"I was drunk and I was scared..."
"Why? You're suppose to support me without wanting anything in return. "
"I'm not talking about the hot-dog situation... I left them there. They were laying on the ground. I don't know if they were okay. "
"Can't you move on? This is serious. My job is on the line. I didn't went to law school all these years for nothing. "
"Habits maybe, I'm not truly sure myself. What should I have done?"
"I don't know if I'm ready to accept the consequences. It is not my first offense. I know it's my fault, but I'm so stressed out."

"That is no excuse! You know how much I love my hot dogs. You took it and Lied about it."
"Don't stress. I forgive you, but you need to buy me some more. "
"Just come clean I know you did it. It is like a scene from my favorite horror novel. "
"You lie about taking my hot dog and you expect me to support you. This really is like my horror novel"
"why what did you do ?"
"I do not even know what to say to you right now. "

من در مورد وضعیت هات داگ صحبت نمی‌کنم... آن‌ها را در آنجا رها کردم. آن‌ها روی زمین خوابیده بودند. نمی‌دانم آیا با آن‌ها همه چیز خوب بود یا نه.

column5:
چرا؟ تو باید مرا حمایت کنی بدون انتظار چیزی به عوض.

می‌توانی ادامه دهی؟ این موضوع جدی است. شغل من در خطر است. من این همه سال به دانشکده حقوق نرفته‌ام تا بی‌فایده باشد.

من نمی‌دانم آیا آماده‌ام که پیامدها را قبول کنم. این اولین تخلف من نیست. من می‌دانم که اشتباه من است، اما خیلی استرس دارم.

نگران نباش. من ببخشیدم، اما باید برای من بخری.

تو درباره گرفتن هات داگ من دروغ می‌گویی و انتظار داری که من تو را حمایت کنم. این واقعاً مثل رمان ترسناک من است.

من حتی نمی‌دانم الان چه بیان کنم به تو.

column3:
Nice! How's the weather?
Looks great for fishing off the boat, but I am stuck cutting hair.

What a job! I hope you get plenty of time off. I haven't been very busy, just reading a lot.
I don't have time to read or fish. I never get to use the boat except for sleeping at night.

Wow. I know how to cut hair. Maybe I can take your place for a while and give you a break! The Pacific sounds nice right now
That would be great. Maybe I could learn to surf too.

I'm not a certified surf instructor, but you could use my board while I'm cutting hair LOL
I will surf when the tide is low.

Yes, start slowly. Do some internet research when you get a chance!
You should google it.

What's the best way to get there?
Thanks! I plan to.

column3:
"Yeah that's one of the reasons its a favorite trail of mines. same, its quite cool"
"I often use stock photos of it for some of the marketing campaigns I work on. I plan too visit very soon. Have you ever been? Yes I have been. Me and my brother have red hair and people on the trail look at us strange."
"Hahaha. Do you look back at them strange? People with red hair are awesome! They're just jealous that's all. That makes me think of the janet jackson song I get lonely lol. They seme ok."
"People like that make me want to scream. Like thar Michael and Janet Jackson song. Lol. I used to listen to George Michael and Atomic Kittens lol I was a teen when that song came out"
"George Michael is the guy who sings Careless Whisper right? I always imagined taking over the world with him. just a crazy thought."
"Here's a thought: Appalachian Trail with a man and woman and the guy has bad breath and talks to her and the Careless Whisper sax plays.. Perfect mint gum commercial! that sound amazing! Me and my brother look like twins! Maybe it could be a double mint gum commercial?"
column4:
"آره، این یکی از دلایلیه که این مسیر یکی از محبوب‌های منه. همینطور، خیلی باحاله"

هههه. آیا به آنها عجیب نگاه می‌کنید؟ افراد با موهای قرمز عالی هستند! آنها فقط حسود هستند. این باعث می‌شود به آهنگ جانت جکسون "من تنها می‌شوم" فکر کنم ههه. آنها به نظر می‌رسند خوب هستند.

جورج مایکل اون پسریه که آهنگ Careless Whisper رو میخونه، درسته؟ همیشه تصور میکردم که باهاش دنیا رو تسخیر میکنم. فقط یه اندیشه دیوانه.
column5:
من اغلب از عکس‌های استوک آن برای برخی از کمپین‌های بازاریابی که روی آن‌ها کار می‌کنم استفاده می‌کنم. من نیز قصد دارم به زودی دیدار کنم. آیا تا به حال رفته‌ای؟ بله، من رفته‌ام. من و برادرم موهای قرمز داریم و مردم روی مسیر به ما عجیب نگاه می‌کنند.

مردم مثل اونا باعث میشن من بخوام جیغ بزنم. مثل آهنگ مایکل و جنت جکسون. ههه. قبلا گوش می‌دادم به جرج مایکل و گروه کیتن‌های اتمیک. ههه. وقتی اون آهنگ منتشر شد، نوجوون بودم.

اینجا یک ایده است: مسیر اپالاچین با یک مرد و زن و مرد بوی بد دهان دارد و با او صحبت می‌کند و ساکسوفون Careless Whisper پخش می‌شود.. تبلیغات عالی برای آدامس نعناعی! این خیلی شگفت‌انگیز به نظر می‌رسد! من و برادرم مثل دوقلوها به نظر می‌رسیم! شاید یک تبلیغات آدامس دوقلویی باشد؟

column3:
"I'm the same way, but honestly, hiking in the mountains is a lot of fun."
"I didn't mean that. I just meant trying that new backpack as being untrustworthy compared to my old one."

"I don't like change, either. Maybe you could try the new backpack out, and keep your old one just in case."
"OK. You know, I would never get rid of my old one. How about you try the new one instead?"

"I could do that. I have a hiking trip planned for next weekend."
"Super. Super. Where are you going?"

"To my vacation home in Pine Mountain Valley. It's near Fort Benning in Georgia. It's great hiking there!"
"Hmmm. I haven't been hiking in Georgia yet. My last hike was near Monte Cristo in Washington State. Whew!"

"Was it a long hike, or just a lot of altitude? I've never been to Washington State, but it looks beautiful in pictures."
"Altitude, for sure. The hike is at least 7 miles. Yeah, it is beautiful. I would like to hike in Georgia sometime."

"It's nice. Pine Mountain Valley is at the foothills of the Smokey Mountains. I can hike the Appalachian trail from there."
"Nothing like Western Washington Cascades, I bet?"
column4:
من همینطورم، اما صادقانه، پیاده‌روی در کوه‌ها خیلی جذاب است.

من هم تغییر را دوست ندارم. شاید بتوانی کوله‌پشتی جدید را امتحان کنی و کوله‌پشتی قدیمی‌ات را فقط به عنوان یک احتیاط نگه داری.

من می‌توانستم این کار را انجام دهم. یک سفر پیاده‌روی برنامه‌ریزی شده دارم برای آخر هفته آینده.

به خانه تعطیلات من در وادی پاین مونتین. این نزدیک فورت بنینگ در جورجیا است. پیاده‌روی کردن در آنجا فوق‌العاده است!

آیا پیاده‌روی طولانی بود یا فقط ارتفاع زیادی داشت؟ من هرگز به ایالت واشنگتن نرفته‌ام، اما در تصاویر زیبا به نظر می‌رسد.

این خوب است. وادی پایه کوه پاین مونتین در پایه های کوه های اسموکی واقع شده است. من می توانم از آنجا مسیر اپالاچین را پیمایش کنم.
column5:
من اونو منظور نداشتم. من فقط منظورم امتحان کردن اون کوله‌پشتی جدید بود که نسبت به کوله‌پشتی قدیمی‌ام ناامن به نظر می‌رسید.

خوب. می‌دونی، من هیچوقت از قدیمیم خلاص نمی‌شم. چطوره به جای اون، امتحان کنی؟

عالی. عالی. کجا می‌روی؟

همم. هنوز تو گرجستان پیاده‌روی نکردم. آخرین پیاده‌روی من نزدیک مونته کریستو در ایالت واشنگتن بود. اوه!

ارتفاع، قطعا. مسیر پیاده‌روی حداقل ۷ مایل است. آره، زیباست. من دوست دارم یک روز در جورجیا پیاده‌روی کنم.

چیزی مثل کسکیدهای غرب واشنگتن نیست، حق ندارم؟

column3:
I study the Bible a lot
So do I. I live in the big city, but I love getting out of town to go on a hike and read.

Oh, me too! Every chance I get. I love nature.
I would love to move to a cabin in the woods and leave the city behind.

It sounds nice. I wouldn't mind having a cabin for retreats, but I like being pretty close to civilization
I would be fine on an off the grid homestead. I have had enough civilization to last a lifetime.

I get like that sometimes. I'm pretty big on creature comforts, though. Plus I have to sell jewelry to pay the bills
What kind of jewelry do you make?

Necklaces, bracelets, that sort of thing. I love using Swarovsk crystals
Crystals are really pretty.

I do like shiny things LOL. Does your work keep you pretty busy?
Absolutely! I work for Cherokee Nation in Indian child welfare.

That's awesome! I admire that greatly!
Thanks. A lot of sad stories.

column3:
Canadians are getting on the map now.. Pun intended lol
yes,your from canada

No Australia. Kangaroo Jack and all that.
Oh wow! I always thought kangaroos were really interesting animals!

Yeah.. They can pack a punch! But I can take it. Got 10 piercings after all
wow that is a lot of piercings! Any tattoos?

Yes! Plenty! Haha!
I have one of a drum! I was the drummer in our high school band. Crazy dare turned true on my arm.

That's kinda cool though! Never heard of a drum tat.. I recently got a tat of a no smoking sign. Celebrating 3 years of not smoking.
Good for you! I smoked for years and quit. The only thing I smoke now is meats on the grill. I hear there is great food down under.

That's great! Yeah, WE'RE the great food here in Australia. Food for the critters!
do you eat kangaroo ? crocodile ?

column3:
'I am male. You?' 
"I'm a female, but when I talk about my hobby people just assume I'm not haha!"

'What is your hobby?'
'Playing chess and making music. '

'There are plenty of females that do that. I would probably enjoy them too if I could ever put down my Harry Potter books.'
'Oh my god, I love Harry Potter too! Who is your favorite character?'

'My favorite is Hagrid. I can relate to his connection to nature and animals. '
'Hermione for sure, so witty and passionate!'

'I do, however, I like the setting of Hogwarts better. '
'You must love Fantastic Beasts as well then?'

'Absolutely. Who is your favorite character?'
"I don't think anybody can dislike the golden trio haha"
'I like her too. '
column4:
من مرد هستم. شما؟

سرگرمی شما چیست؟

column3:
"Yes! Not gonna lie though, it's a bit stressful. Especially the fact we had to move."
"I can imagine it can be stressful, but all that is behind you now."

"You're right! It's time for celebration, which funny enough is the name of my new town haha! How's your job going?"
"It is going alright I guess. I love what I do, but it can be very stressful."

"Understandable! What do you do when you're stressed out?"
"I love to spend time in nature."

"Oh cool. Do you just relax or like go on hikes?"
"Both. I am a hunter so I spend a lot of time in nature. My family does not eat any store bought meat."

"Can you hunt all year round when you are?"
"There is almost always something in season, but most is in the fall or winter. I usually am able to keep our freezers full throughout the year."

"That's really cool! I wish I could do the same, but I can't get myself to push the trigger in front of an animal."
"Hunting is something passed down in my family. We are Cherokee and only hunt with traditional methods."

column3:
Wow! Ten years is a long time to be prepared. I plan 3 years ahead.
The Internet has made it a lot easier! I used to be a travel agent a long time ago, though. Lots of places I still need to see!

Yes, the Internet helps me research my travel and career options. Do your old job?
It's much easier now. I'm always planning trips in my mind -- I'm planning every trip I'm going to take for the next five years

I am too forgetful. You must have a great memory. Do you miss your old travel agent job?
Sometimes. It was fun planning trips for other people, and gave me good ideas about where I'd like to go. What destination do you dream about going to?

I really want to go to Novalja, Croatia. Next year, in 2020, they are hosting the Fresh Island rap festival.
How awesome! My father's family is from Croatia and I've always wanted to go there. That sounds amazing!

Really? That is awesome! I hope you do get to go. Do you still have family in Croatia?
Yes, I only know them through Facebook, though. And I love Croatian rap! Fun to watch YouTube videos LOL

That is really cool. I try to stay in touch with my family through Facebook. They are all in the UK.
That's one thing Facebook is good for. I've found family on several continents that I would have never known about otherwise. Do you miss the UK?

column3:
It is all steak the name is determined from what part of the cow it comes from.
I guess it make sense, yes. I like to eat my steak medium rare. How do you like yours cooked?

I like medium well to well.
Some people would say that you like them overcooked haha!

I have had many people tell me that. I just can't bring myself to eat it any less done.
I can understand, no judgment here! My mom used to cook them well done because she was afraid of food poisoning.

I am not sure of why. I eat duck medium.
Duck steak? So you agree that steak can be mean more than just cow meat?

It can be. I have deer steak in the freezer, but the duck is duck breast.
Did you hunt the deer on your own or just store bought?

I hunt them. My family does not buy meat from a store.
That's pretty cool. You must save money then.

همه گوشت گوساله است و نام آن از قسمتی که از گاو می‌آید تعیین می‌شود.

من میانه تا خوب دوست دارم.

من بسیاری از افراد به من گفته‌اند. من نمی‌توانم خودم را متقاعد کنم که آن را کمتر از این بخورم.

مطمئن نیستم که چرا. من اردک را به حالت میانه می‌خورم.

ممکن است. من گوشت گوزن در فریزر دارم، اما انار انار است.

من آن‌ها را شکار می‌کنم. خانواده‌ام گوشت را از فروشگاه نمی‌خرد.

column3:
"I've always been interested in criminal justice. My mother was a victim of violent crime once, and I've always wanted to be in law enforcement."
"Sorry to hear about your mother. Good for you! Better job than mine working at Target"

"Target's a great store. I'm glad I've got one so close to home. How long have you worked there?"
"Just started 3 days ago! I get a discount on dog biscuits. I buy my dog one after work every day. But i have a secret! "

"Oh yeah? What's that? You tell me yours and I'll tell you mine"
"The dog treats! I cant help"

"LOL! Some of them do look tempting. My secret: I'm afraid of the dark. I hope they don't figure that out at the police academy!"
"hahahahah. We have that in common! "

"I'll have to give the dog treat thing a try!"
"I can only eat them in the dark! lol"

"LOLOL! That's the funniest thing I've heard all day! I'll have to tell my mom that one. She's really my best friend"
"My dog is not quite my best friend, but she sure does cheer me up a ton!"

همیشه به عدالت کیفری علاقه داشته‌ام. مادرم یکبار قربانی جنایت خشونت‌آمیز شد و همیشه می‌خواستم در انجمن حقوقی فعالیت کنم.

باید سعی کنم به سگ یک مکافات بدهم!

"I don't have kids, unfortunately - boating accident."
"So sorry to hear. They are laying in green pastures sure..."
"That's sad. So have you seen 16 candles?"
"I have seen every single one! All sad. All green! I think green is my favorite color. What is yours?"
"Grey is probably my favourite colour, but I like blue. What's you're favourite one?"
"Blue is nice. What kind of music do you like?"
"I like rock and rap mainly, though I enjoy a bit of synth pop music as well. Prefer films though. What about you?"
"ROCK! I like rock and roll. BINGO"

column3:
"I'd love to be able to play banjo, but I can only play the guitar"
"It's basically the same, just have to memorize new chords, and practice finger picking. "
"Yeah, the only problem is that banjos cost a fortune. Are you in a band?"
"Oh I get you, they definitely are expensive instruments. I was in a band before yes!"
"I'd have loved to be in a band, but life takes over. I'm more into fitness and running these days, you?"
"Interest and passions seems to change with time. That's amazing that you're into fitness. Music is my favorite hobby. "
"Yeah. Who's your absolute favourite?"
"It is hard to pick one. My favorite artist right now is K flay. Do you know her?"
"No but I think I'll Google her for a listen. I'm quite fond of female vocalists. Do you recommend any others?"
"I'm glad. Oh the list could go on forever. Florence and the machine, Haim, Courage my love, Sainte."
"I wish I still enjoyed music like I used to. I don't find the same joy from it that I once did."
"That's difficult to deal with sometimes I find, when we lose interest. Do you used to go to concerts?"

column3:
It takes a true poet to write that down
Some thoughts you just have to capture before they're gone, right?

i agree completely.
Do you like rock music? Metallica, ACDC, or Nirvana?

I live in Seattle and have seen most of those groups live! I was born a giant
Awh man! That's incredible, who among those you saw was your favorite?

Nirvana! Good thing I am tall! My parents were over 6 ft. i could see over the other peoples heads. Do you like them?
I think they are great. They are in strong rotation on my playlist. I'm a cab driver, so my customers get to know good music. RIP Cobain

cab driver? i hope that you are not driving now lol. i am a angry democrat,you/?
Shh, don't tell! Is angry democrat your profession or hobby? I just plain and simple don't trust the govt.

Its all a conspiracy my friend. Listen to the late ones. The truth is hidden in never mind.
The late ones? The truth is hidden? Where?! I NEED to know.

column3:
Who is your favourite author?
My favourite author is Robin Hobb. She writes epic fantasy with wonderful characters. What about you?

Dan Parkinson has some excellent novels.  I really like the Dragonlance series.  
I've heard of that series but haven't read it. What did you like about it?

I like that it takes place in a world with endless possibilities, the author makes you feel like you're there!
That's the main draw with fantasy for me. The sheer scope makes anything possible, and with a good writer, you're immersed. 

Do you read anything by George RR Martin?
Yeah, I've read his Song of Ice and Fire. He's probably my second or third favourite author. I take it you're also a fan?

I am definitely!  And the t.v. adaptation was great... until the way the writers ended it.  What did you think?
I think the two creators are terrible writers and I have no idea how they managed to blag their way through the first 5 seasons.

I enjoyed most of the series, but the way they wrapped it up so fast was a disservice to the story.
Yeah. They had one eye on Star Wars and just wanted GoT over. I read last week that Star Wars dropped them!
column4:
نویسنده مورد علاقه‌ات کیه؟

دن پارکینسون چند رمان عالی دارد. من واقعاً سری کتاب‌های اژدهاپیکس را دوست دارم.

من دوست دارم که این داستان در یک دنیایی با امکانات بی پایان اتفاق بیفتد، نویسنده باعث می شود که احساس کنید که خودتان در آنجا هستید!

آیا هر چیزی از جورج آر آر مارتین می‌خوانید؟

من قطعاً! و تلویزیونی بسیار عالی بود... تا زمانی که نویسندگان آن را پایان دادند. شما چه فکری می‌کنید؟

من از بیشتر سریال لذت بردم، اما روشی که آنها به سرعت آن را پایان دادند، به داستان ظلم کرد.
column5:
نویسنده مورد علاقه‌ام رابین هاب است. او داستان‌های فانتزی حماسی با شخصیت‌های فوق‌العاده می‌نویسد. شما چه نظری دارید؟

من از اون سریال شنیده‌ام اما نخوانده‌ام. چه چیزی از آن دوست داشتی؟

این چیزی است که برای من جذابیت اصلی فانتزی است. دامنه ی بسیار گسترده این امکان را فراهم می کند که هر چیزی ممکن باشد و با یک نویسنده خوب، شما به آن فرو می روید.

بله، من کتاب آهنگ یخ و آتش او را خوانده‌ام. احتمالاً او نویسنده مورد علاقه دوم یا سوم من است. فکر می‌کنم شما هم طرفدار او هستید؟

فکر می‌کنم دو نویسنده‌ی این سریال نویسنده‌های بدی هستند و نمی‌دانم چطور موفق شدند تا از فصل‌های اول تا پنجم راه بیافتند.

'I love cokes!' 'Me too! I love them.'
'i start my day with one' "That's cool. I buy the box of six and don't share with anyone"
"LOL! i wouldn't either" 'Have you ever tried Jones Soda? They have some awesome flavors! the cream soda one is my fav'
'Never heard of it. Those cream sodas are yummy' 'yeah but my very favourite is mountain dew!!!!! i drink one every single day while I am in chess club'
"I don't know why people love that moutain dew! A lot of people I meet love them too" 'yeah i just think it is very refreshing and they have many flavours'
"i haven't tried it in awhile - like years - maybe i should try it again" 'i would if i were you, im sure they have revised the formula since and you could try a new flavour'

این بیشتر باید سخت باشه - چون تو هم داری تو مدرسه هستی - نباید اجازه بدی که این موضوع تو رو ناراحت کنه

هر دو! من یک مدتی به دانشگاه رفتم و یک شغل تمام وقت دارم، اما توانستم از آن عبور کنم.

wow i really like kayaking that is an interesting fact
i started kayaking about 3 years ago, but stopped after I tumped over and couldn't get back on it

oh wow yeah i would be afraid, sometimes you do not know what is under the water, like crabs
we have seen alligators in the waters that I turned over in. it was very scary. i haven't been back on it

yeah i would not be too interested in falling into water like that
right! i live in an apartment, asked the office people if i could take my kayak to the pool, late at night to i could practice recovery

what did they say
they said no! but, if i would have done it late at night, they probably wouldn't have known. i'm totally scared to go back in the water

yeah they totally wouldnt know who goes to the pool at night
i totally loved it - being on the water, i do love the water

i love the water too it is so calming
yes it is!! just floating around, so relaxing. i used to go after work

اوه واو آره من میترسیدم، گاهی اوقات نمیدونی چه چیزی زیر آبه، مثل خرچنگ ها

بله، من خیلی علاقه‌ای به افتادن به آب مانند آن ندارم.

آنها چه گفتند؟

آره، کاملا نمی‌دونن کی شب‌ها به استخر می‌ره

من هم آب را دوست دارم، آنقدر آرام بخش است
column5:
سه سال پیش شروع به کایاک کردم، اما بعد از اینکه توی آب تکان خوردم و نتوانستم دوباره برگردم، کایاک کردن را متوقف کردم.

ما تمساح‌ها را در آبهایی که من آنها را برگرداندم دیدیم. این بسیار ترسناک بود. من دیگر برنگشته‌ام.

درست است! من در یک آپارتمان زندگی می‌کنم، از مردم دفتر پرسیدم که آیا می‌توانم کایاک خود را به استخر ببرم، در ساعت‌های دیر شب تا بتوانم تمرین بازیابی کنم.

آن‌ها گفتند نه! اما اگر من آن کار را شب دیر انجام می‌دادم، احتمالاً آن‌ها متوجه نمی‌شدند. من کاملاً ترسیده‌ام که دوباره وارد آب شوم.

من کاملاً از آن لذت بردم - بودن در آب، من واقعاً آب را دوست دارم

بله، درسته!! فقط دور و بر می‌پیچم، خیلی آرامش بخشه. قبلا بعد از کار می‌رفتم

column3:
If you eat meat then you are hurting the enviroment.
I would be less satisfied without meat but I could eat less of it.

Have you ever just thought about eating a fresh non meat pizza at a flower shop? That would be nice.
I haven't. I typically eat pizza at a pizza shop. I prefer meat pizza, but I like cheese pizza as well. How long have you not eaten meat?

I never really ate pizza with meat on it. Since my favorite chicken died in front of my eyes for food, I been off meat forever.
Wow! Someone ate your favorite chicken? That's rough. Did you know it was going to be raised for food before it became your favorite chicken?

No. I never knew any animal was raised for food. I used to think that all meat was from plants. My parents lied to me.
What did you think happened to the animals? So, you ate meat, but you though it came from plants? How long did you believe this?

I believed it until the day my chicken was murdered at the local flower shop..
So why would you want to eat pizza at the flower shop where your chicken was killed? You said it would be nice. That seems odd.

It's to prove to my chicken that I will never eat meat again.
Do you think the chicken would even know? It's dead. Why not just eat your pizza at a pizza shop?
column4:
اگر گوشت بخوری، به محیط زیست آسیب می‌زنی.

آیا تا به حال فکر کرده‌اید که یک پیتزای تازه بدون گوشت را در یک گلفروشی بخورید؟ این خوب خواهد بود.

هیچوقت واقعا پیتزا با گوشت نخوردم. از زمانی که مرغ مورد علاقه‌ام جلوی چشم‌هام برای غذا مرد، هیچوقت گوشت نخوردم.

نه. من هرگز نمی‌دانستم که هیچ حیوانی برای غذا پرورش داده می‌شود. من فکر می‌کردم که تمام گوشت‌ها از گیاهان بود. والدینم به من دروغ گفتند.

من تا روزی که مرغ من در گلفروشی محلی کشته شد، باورش می‌کردم.

این برای اثبات به مرغ من است که دیگر هرگز گوشت نخواهم خورد.
column5:
من بدون گوشت کمتر راضی می‌شوم اما می‌توانم کمتر از آن بخورم.

من نخوردم. من معمولاً پیتزا را در یک فروشگاه پیتزا می‌خورم. من پیتزای گوشت را ترجیح می‌دهم، اما پیتزای پنیر را هم دوست دارم. شما چه مدت است که گوشت نخورده‌اید؟

واو! کسی مرغ مورد علاقه‌ات رو خورد؟ این خیلی سخته. آیا می‌دونستی که قرار بود برای خوراک پرورش پیدا کنه قبل از اینکه مرغ مورد علاقه‌ات بشه؟

چه فکری می‌کردی چه اتفاقی برای حیوانات افتاده است؟ پس تو گوشت خوردی، اما فکر می‌کردی از گیاه‌ها می‌آید؟ چه مدت اعتقاد داشتی اینطور است؟

پس چرا می‌خواهی پیتزا را در گلفروشی که مرغ تو در آنجا کشته شد، بخوری؟ تو گفتی خوب خواهد بود. این به نظر عجیب می‌رسد.

آیا فکر می‌کنید مرغ حتی متوجه می‌شود؟ او مرده است. چرا فقط پیتزای خود را در یک فروشگاه پیتزا نمی‌خورید؟

column3:
"Do you do them in pen or pencil? That's the true test of a crossword puzzle lover."
"I'm an experienced crossword player so I like to do them in pen! How about you?"

Same here, but it took me years before I was confident enough to do so. My girlfriend finally talked me into just trying it. I always use pen now.
That really good. Though I still do make mistakes every now and then. How often do you do crossword puzzles throughout the week?

Daily. I like to do the New York Times crossword every day. I also have a book of crossword puzzles that I do when I'm bored.
Impressive! I do like doing crossword puzzles with pen and paper but I find it easier now to do them on my phone or tablet.

They are okay on the phone but it just doesn't feel the same as the ones on paper. It's like an e-reader vs a book. Which do you prefer?
I feel like its just more convenient when I read books on an e-reader rather then a book so I would prefer e-reader if I'm on the go!

I think it just depends. I prefer a book. I like the feel, the smell, having it in my hands. When I travel I bring the e-reader.
I agree! I do prefer books when I'm at home the smell of a good book would definitely make you keep want to reading.

Totally! I always feel weird saying that to people. Not everyone understands. How often do you read? I go through at least a book a week.
usually once a month . how has your weekend been ?
column4:
آیا آنها را با خودکار یا مداد انجام می دهید؟ این آزمون واقعی عاشقان پازل کلمات متقاعد است.

همینجوری من هم هستم، اما سال‌ها طول کشید تا اعتماد به نفس کافی پیدا کنم. دوست دخترم سرانجام من را متقاعد کرد که فقط امتحان کنم. من همیشه اکنون قلم استفاده می‌کنم.

هر روز. من دوست دارم هر روزه کراس ورد نیویورک تایمز را حل کنم. همچنین یک کتاب کراس ورد دارم که وقتی خسته می‌شوم آن را حل می‌کنم.

آن‌ها در تلفن خوب هستند اما احساس نمی‌کنم که مثل کتاب‌های کاغذی باشد. انگار که یک خواننده الکترونیکی در مقابل یک کتاب است. شما کدام را ترجیح می‌دهید؟

فکر می‌کنم که فقط به شرایط بستگی دارد. من کتاب را ترجیح می‌دهم. من احساس آن را دوست دارم، بوی آن را، داشتن آن در دستانم. وقتی سفر می‌کنم، ریدر را همراه می‌آورم.

کاملا! همیشه احساس عجیبی می‌کنم وقتی این را به افراد می‌گویم. همه نمی‌فهمند. چقدر اغلب کتاب می‌خوانید؟ من حداقل یک کتاب در هفته می‌خوانم.
column5:
من یک بازیکن تجربه‌کرده کراس ورد هستم، بنابراین دوست دارم آن‌ها را با خودکار انجام دهم! شما چطور؟

این واقعاً خوب است. اگرچه من هنوز هر اکنون و سپس اشتباه می‌کنم. چقدر در هفته به پازل‌های کلمه‌ای می‌پردازید؟

تحت تاثیر قرار دهنده! من واقعا دوست دارم که پازل های کلمه ای را با قلم و کاغذ انجام دهم اما الان آسان تر می یابم که آنها را روی تلفن یا تبلت انجام دهم.

من احساس می‌کنم که وقتی کتاب‌ها را روی یک خواننده الکترونیکی می‌خوانم به جای کتاب، راحت‌تر است، بنابراین اگر در حال حرکت هستم، ترجیح می‌دهم خواننده الکترونیکی را داشته باشم!

موافقم! من وقتی در خانه هستم کتاب‌ها را ترجیح می‌دهم، بوی خوب یک کتاب قطعا باعث می‌شود که بخواهید به خواندن ادامه دهید.

معمولاً یک بار در ماه. آخر هفته شما چطور بوده است؟

column3:
"I'm just listening to some music helps the time go by faster."
"I usually turn on the tv while I clean. It help make it go by faster for me too. I like watching scooby doo. Do you watch tv? "
"I don't watch tv much anymore. Most of things I watch are via the internet now like netflix and youtube."
"I still consider that tv. I might watch it on my computer but it essentially the same. I don't have cable is all."
'I disagree watching things via the internet goes beyond whats on the tv i feel like its more of a community people sharing their lives.'
"Sure, if you are watching people's videos on youtube. But I mean netflix, hulu, amazon prime. Those are just tv on the internet. What shows do you watch on netflix?"
"I'm watching black summer. Its a tv show about the zombie pandemic how about you? "
"I'm watching Black Mirror. No zombies but random stories about how this technology age effects the world. Do you marathon watch or episode here and there?"
'Yes I have seen Black Mirror before. If the should is good enough I like watching them all in one go. '
'Wow...watching that much "tv" is too much for me. I could maybe do 2 episodes at a time...maybe. What do for hobbies? I like to draw comic book scenes.'
'I hate having to wait to find out what happened after a good episode so I have to watch the next episode. I like go to the gym.'
'cardio or weights?'
column4:
من فقط دارم موزیک گوش می‌دم که زمان سریع‌تر بگذره.

من دیگر زیاد تلویزیون نمی‌بینم. بیشتر چیزهایی که می‌بینم از طریق اینترنت است مثل نتفلیکس و یوتیوب.

من مخالفم که تماشای چیزها از طریق اینترنت فراتر از آنچه در تلویزیون است، احساس می‌کنم که این بیشتر یک جامعه است که مردم زندگی‌های خود را به اشتراک می‌گذارند.

بله، قبلاً سریال Black Mirror را دیده‌ام. اگر داستان خوب باشد، دوست دارم همه‌ی قسمت‌ها را پشت سر هم تماشا کنم.

من از اینکه باید منتظر بمانم تا بفهمم چه اتفاقی پس از یک قسمت خوب افتاده است، بیزارم، بنابراین باید قسمت بعدی را تماشا کنم. من دوست دارم به باشگاه ورزشی بروم.

معمولاً وقتی دارم تمیز می‌کنم تلویزیون رو روشن می‌کنم. این کار باعث می‌شه که زمان سریع‌تر بگذره برام. من دوست دارم اسکوبی دو رو ببینم. تو تلویزیون می‌بینی؟

هنوز هم فکر می‌کنم که تلویزیون است. ممکن است آن را روی کامپیوترم تماشا کنم اما اساساً همان است. من کابل ندارم، همین.

حتما، اگر شما ویدیوهای مردم را در یوتیوب تماشا می کنید. اما منظورم نتفلیکس، هولو، آمازون پرایم است. اینها فقط تلویزیون در اینترنت هستند. چه بجنس هایی را در نتفلیکس تماشا می کنید؟

من دارم سریال Black Mirror رو تماشا می‌کنم. هیچ زامبی‌ای نیست، اما داستان‌های تصادفی درباره‌ی اینکه چگونه عصر فناوری بر جهان تأثیر می‌گذارد. آیا شما هم ماراتن تماشا می‌کنید یا هر قسمت رو یکی یکی؟

وای...تماشای اینقدر "تلویزیون" برای من خیلی زیاده. شاید بتوانم دو قسمت را همزمان تماشا کنم...شاید. برای سرگرمی چه کار می‌کنید؟ من دوست دارم صحنه‌های کتاب‌های کمیک را نقاشی کنم.

How did your son get so much sugar in his system?

I think it must be from all the sugary drinks he got from the neighbor kid's house.
Maybe you should ban him from having any sugary drinks as punishment. It might make him more healthy as well.

That's a good idea, I will need to talk with the neighbor about this to ensure he sticks to it.

"That's interesting, I am a judge right now."
"No i dont, i am an artist and my drawings bring me lots of money"

"Very nice, we need more artists in the world, how long have you been drawing?"
"so about 6 years or more"

"I'm on the circuit court, but I'm about to find out what article III of the constitution is all about."
"Law seems difficult it seems.."

"Very difficult, but mostly memorization and there's always reference materials."
"Hope you watch movies to keep you sane lol, i enjoy movies, kinda takes the stress of the day off for me"

"Definitely, I watch tv mostly, but catch some movies on the weekends if i have time."
"I hear you :) I do the same"

"Hopefully not too much Law and Order, that show isn't accurate!"
"no not at all its a fantasy show, law certainly doesnt work that way"

column3:
'I had to excuse myself professionally before I said something that could cause trouble.'
'Wow. I don't know if I would have been able to do that. I work at a cinema...people are rude to me all the time.'

'I am sorry to hear that, people that are rude to employees are the worst.'
'I agree. I never understand why they do that. I got popcorn thrown at me once. I don't even like popcorn!'

"Oh that just sounds awful, I am surprised you haven't quit that job yet."
"It's in the works, believe me. This is just my job while I'm in school. I have a semester left! What do you do?"

'I have been working in retail while I finish up school, same as you I suppose.'
'What are you studying?' "I'm studying engineering."

"I am just going for an associate's degree for the time being. You?"
'I want to work with plastics. Find/create a more environmentally safe option. What kind of associates degree are you working towards?'

column3:
'Tell me a little bit more about why you feel this way? Was there something that happened recently?'
'Indeed, I got the bad news of my husband doing something behind my back. He met up with another woman!'

'Oh wow, that is not good. What a a jerk! How did you find out?'
'It\'s ironic because one of my grand children told me during our family dinner. She was like "Pops met up with a lady yesterday. They were holding hands!"'

'Oh my did you confront your husband about this? I would be soooo mad!'
"Why yes, I did! The moment he came home from work, I just had to confront him right then n' there."

'That must have taken some courage- and what did "mr. innoncent" have to say for himself? I would have been going into a clinical depression.'
'He kept on playing dumb and acted as if he had no idea what I was rambling on about. I guess you could neither of us slept well that night.'

'of course he did! What do you see as you next step here?'
"I don't want to be a drama queen, but I'd thought of bringing the two of us to a relationship counselor. See if we could work something out."

'That seems ilke a good idea- if only you can get the creep to go.'
"I guess, but for now I'm still trying to figure out what happens next! I'm just very heartbroken by all of this."

column3:
'She likes to spend more time talking to her friends on facebook than spending time with me.'
"Wow, I'm sorry to hear that! I could understand why that may bother you so much."

"Yes, sometimes I feel as though she doesn't value her relationship with me as much as she does with her online friends."
"Yeah, forget about her. If it makes you feel better, you can come to my house and I'll cook for you!"

'LoL. As tempting as that may be, I could not do that to her. We have been together three years already and I do love her.'
"Yeah, sure. But come on... think about it, she obviously doesn't like you as much as you think."

'Maybe. Or does she feel neglected because I work such long hours as a nurse?'
"It's a possibility. Or maybe she's secretly talking to another guy?"

'Well, she does have that one guy friend that she seems pretty chatty with. It does make me wonder.'
'Yeah, you should probably look into that more. She sounds shady.'

'So are you suggesting that I should come right out and ask her? Or should I look at her phone when she is out of the room?'
"I know it sounds bad, but maybe snoop through her phone while she's asleep or something."
column4:
او دوست دارد بیشتر وقت خود را صحبت کردن با دوستانش در فیسبوک صرف کند تا وقت خود را با من بگذراند.

بله، گاهی احساس می‌کنم که او ارتباطش با من را به اندازه دوستان آنلاینش ارزش قائل نمی‌شود.

"ههه. هر چقدر جذاب باشد، من نمی‌توانم این کار را به او بکنم. ما سه سال است که با هم هستیم و من واقعا او را دوست دارم."

شاید. یا او احساس تحت توجهی می‌کند چون من به عنوان یک پرستار ساعت‌های طولانی کار می‌کنم؟

خب، او یک دوست پسر دارد که با او خیلی حرف میزند. این باعث میشود من تعجب کنم.

پس آیا شما پیشنهاد می‌دهید که من باید مستقیماً از او بپرسم؟ یا باید به تلفن همراهش نگاه کنم وقتی او از اتاق خارج است؟

column3:
'I enjoyed my last game at the YMCA, where do you play?'
'I usually play at our local park. I have a group of friends I meet up with on Friday afternoons.'

'That seems like fun to play outdoors, do you play indoors if it rains or snows?'
"LoL. Well, we have been known to play in my garage if all else fails. I don't use the garage for my car, so it's perfect!"

'Sounds fun! I really want to enter a tournament some day!'
"That would be fun. I'm a competitive person so that sounds like something I would enjoy!"

'You should start playing competitively, and go for the Gold in the Olympics games!'
'Have you ever played in a tournament and won?'

"Not yet, I'm going to sign up for my first one soon!"
'Does your YMCA offer tournaments there?'

"Badminto isn't very popular here therefore I have to go to another location. They really like to play raquetball here by the beach!"
"Raquetball by the beach? I can only imagine how that's possible?! LOL"

'Oh wow, you sound very smart!'
'Thank you! I studied history at school. Do you enjoy learning about history?'

"Yeah, sometimes. But it must be interesting or else I'll get bored!"
"I agree, some history can be boring. They're more interesting if it's a romantic story"

"Indeed. When I hear about romantic stories, it touches my heart, y'know? The feels."
'I like to live in the moment. Do you like intimacy?'

'Oh, definitely! I need a man in my life who wants to be as intimate as I.'
'I think the supply of gentlemen these days are dwindling. '

"Sadly, that's true. If only I ran into more decent men."
'They do exist, trust me. '

'If you know some, introduce those men for me, please! The more men, the merrier.'
'Hi, nice to meet you. Haha!'

column3:
"Yeah, they're all good, they just ate some lego ad had to have surgery to get it out.  Dogs, eh?"
"Well that's one way to get it out. Poor doggy!"

"I know!! I don't know what I'd do if anything happened to my babies!  Have you got any yourself?"
"Yes, I have a small breed dog. She's my little shadow and follows me wherever I go. "

"Oh that's precious! I have a large breed male and a small breed female, they're so sweet together. What's her name?"
"Izabella. We call her Bella for short. She's my rescue pup from the shelter."

"Oh that's such a cute name.  Do you know what breed she is?  It can be hard with shelter dogs sometimes"
"They thought chihuahua, however, it turns out she's a rat terrier mix. She's the sweetest girl, albeit a little klutzy at times, LOL."

"A rat terrier?  Oh those are some zoomy babies!  Is she a bit of a wild one?"
"Not at all. She's mostly calm. She'll get one good burst of energy sometimes and just run and chase her ball."

"Ah, their pet was in need of vet bills.  It wasn't smart but it was worth it haha"
"I hope their pet is okay? Have you heard any updates yet?"

column3:
I guess so. That way I can get more things done in the day. Do you have a teenager?
Yes and sometimes it can be so difficult!

I agree. My teenager has not once asked me if I needed any help with household chores. Does your teenager help you out around the house?
Well, only with prodding. I've had to negotiate a lot to get them to do much of anything, but it's gotten better this last year.

That's good to hear. Maybe your teenager can encourage mine to help out, haha! Do you drive your teenager to school?
My teen just got his license this summer, so we let him drive the old Ford to give him some experience and independence.

Oh I see. That's nice. Mine hasn't got her license yet so I still drive her to school in my Prius.
He just seems to forget to change the radio station back to my country music. I guess hip-hop is more his style, LOL.

"It's a catholic primary school, it's the best school in the area. Are your kids still in school?"
"yes both my children are in school but they do not go to a private school"

'How wonderful, have you been to any national parks recently?'
'No I do not have a lot of time. I spend most of my time working at a museum'

'I enjoy history museums, do you take your kids to work?'
'sometimes when they have take your kids to work day lol.'

"That's interesting, I like my job."
"Well it is important to like your job. I do not have a lot of people to hang out with so it's mainly my kids."

'Kids can be fun too, they have their interested which can be interesting for me too.'
'Yeah my children are quite the characters'

column3:
"Because of all the Russian collusion in the elections... It's scary how much happens that we don't know about"
"I am more interested in the collusion with Ukraine."

"I haven't heard about that one?"
"I love following politics but sometimes it is hard to know what to believe. "

"Or who to believe... It's just a massive game of he-said-she-said"
"It really feels like we are apart of a fake world with all the fake news."

"What's your favourite conspiracy theory?"
"I try to avoid conspiracy theories."

"As a writer, I love them. They can be so mind blowing. Why do you avoid them?"
"Many of them are manufactured to harm the other side and do not follow facts."

"How so?"
"With Trumps Russian collusion the investigation report has come out saying no collusion, but people still believe it."
